events.title: Tarot Readings with Epiphany
events.event_description: Stop by and ask if Epiphany is in for a reading! Several decks will be available to choose from, both Tarot and Oracle!

events.title: Daily Doodling
events.event_description: Stop by our doodle boards anytime to create some evaporating art!

events.title: Flo practice
events.event_description: Learning to find your flo? Playing with a new toy? Want to learn some tricks? Come practice, learn, and find your groove with Oy My Back 40. (Some flo toys will be provided, bubble toys, spin, juggling, flow, fans, prototypes and fire welcome)

events.title: Damp Your Doodle - NA Happy Hour
events.event_description: Bring your cup! We're serving up non-alcoholic drink concoctions. Stop by for handcrafted "dirty sodas" and fresh mocktails.

events.title: Lakes of Fire Greeters Annual FOOD DRIVE
events.event_description: Show us your cans !!! Are you cooking for everyone, or just for your Lakes of Fire camp? Take a moment to grab an extra can or two or ten, for our food donation project. Practice some Civic Responsibility and give back to the community we call home each year. All food is being donated to the Trinity Community Pantry in New Era Michigan. This food bank provides more than 4,500 lbs of food to more than 180 families every week. This area of Michigan has one of the highest hunger rates and you can help! The "Greeter Station" and ONLY the Greeter Station will be accepting the food donations through the whole event up to 4 p.m. on Sunday exodus. We want to see your cans ! Last year we donated over 800 LBS to the New Era Food Pantry, WAY TO GO LAKES OF FIRE, lets keep up the awesome momentum! ! ! ! ! Requirements: Unopened Non-perishable Cans are preferred, No glass please. Also welcome are unopened unused toiletries. Shampoos, soap. toothbrushes, toothpaste, deodorant etc. are also sorely needed. If you have any question flag down Mistress Colleen, Co. Lead of Greeeters, they/them, she/her will be more than happy to talk to you about this project.

events.title: Hurricane Shots
events.event_description: The best way to start your night? A blast of cold water, a slap to wake you up, and a rush of energy to shake off the day. Nothing says Fuck Your Burn like a chaotic refresh before diving in. Swing by the Safe Zone bar-Leia’s got the storm ready. Alcohol optional, consent required.

events.title: Euphoria Lounge
events.event_description: Stop by Safe Zone’s juice and shot bar! Grab a tasty alcohol-free drink, or hit up the shot bar if you’re in the mood for something stronger. You can even mix it up and try both. Chill out with some great music, meet awesome folks, and soak in the good vibes!

events.title: Bloody Ticks @ the Snickerin’ Tick Tavern
events.event_description: All the best in blood sucking bloody ticks… not your average Bloody Mary bar.

events.title: Tetherball
events.event_description: Come whack a ball in Beantown!

events.title: Smoothiegasm
events.event_description: Have blender will travel!  Enjoy a healthy fruit/yogurt based concoction (no alcohol) to start your day.  Bring your own ingredients if you want.  We'll blend up all the goodness.

events.title: Cosmic Tarot Readings
events.event_description: Slow down, drop in, and let the cards speak. Join us in the tarot den by the dome for one-on-one tarot readings that invite reflection, insight, and a deeper connection to your path. Whether you come with a question or just an open heart, each reading is a space to explore the unseen and reconnect with your own inner knowing. Come as you are-the messages will meet you there.

events.title: Duck Hunt
events.event_description: Keep your eyes peeled-ducks have invaded the theme camps! 🦆 Every signed-up camp has a hidden duck waiting to be found. Rally your team, start the search, and see if you can uncover the most ducks. Head over to Safe Zone to jump into the fun and take on the challenge!

events.title: Sunrise Saloon
events.event_description: Watch the sunrise over the lake with a tasty beverage!

events.title: Tick-sney hour
events.event_description: Do you like belting it out to the most hit kids songs of all time? How about those fun floaty blobs of soap? Diso lights? Come young and old to join the Little Ticks in our "Tick-sney" dancing, bubble party and "let it go"!

events.title: Mrs Roper Pub Crawl
events.event_description:
Channel your inner Mrs Roper (or Stanley) Meet at the DPW bar at 3pm Friday. We will visit the finest bars on the lake. Suggested attire: Kaftan, chunky jewelry, big sunglasses, curly wig, etc. It will be fun, join us, 3-6 Friday!

Bring a cup

events.title: Break-xodus
events.event_description: Quit yer bitchin' and pack your kitchen! We will feed you a hot breakfast on Sunday morning! Bacon, eggs, bagels, coffee, juice - and breakfast burritos! Gluten-free options will be on hand. Food available until 11:30, or until we run out!

events.title: Snickerin’ Tick Tavern
events.event_description:
Welcome back to Lake’s favorite watering hole, (alcohol and nonalcoholic beverages). Spin the Wheel and play some games.
TickTown loves you!

events.title: Finding Stability in Chaos: A Guided Chakra Meditation and Ritual
events.event_description:
Finding Stability in Chaos is a wellness workshop to help you feel more grounded during uncertain times. We’ll use guided meditation, chakra balancing, and simple ritual practices to support a sense of calm and inner strength.

This experience is designed to reconnect you with your full self and help you feel more steady and empowered-in your life and in your community. You're invited to bring a meaningful object, like a necklace, stone, or keepsake, to charge with grounding energy.

No experience with meditation or ritual is needed-just come with an open heart and your chosen item. Let's restore balance together.
events.where_name: North of the showers, in the shade

events.title: Coloring Hour
events.event_description: Join us for a relaxing hour of midday coloring. Choose between different coloring page designs, grab some crayons and a clipboard, and sit down in our chill space while you unleash your imagination and vibe to the music! Feel free to meet and connect with others while you color, or take a corner to yourself and recharge.

events.title: Keychain Making Station
events.event_description: Make a keepsake of your time on the lake! Choose from hand-drawn designs and customize your own keychain using the provided tools and supplies.   *The keychain station will be up as long as supplies are available. They are limited, so please be considerate of others. Please supervise/assist small children as this will be a self-guided activity with written instructions and potentially hazardous pieces*

events.title: Trunk Babies
events.event_description: Come on over to The Funkyard and fill out an adoption application for Trunk Babies. We’ll be connecting babies with their forever burner.

events.title: Wake Up Slaps
events.event_description: Need a wake-up call after a long burn? Leia’s got you covered with a wonderful wake-up hurricane. Ice-cold water, a playful slap, and the jolt to get moving. Alcohol available, or grab juice and electrolytes for a balanced reset. No slow mornings, just pure adrenaline to power through the final stretch. Shake off the night and rally after a long burn night.

events.title: Queer Together
events.event_description: Queer Together is the perfect event for queer people to connect, share stories, and celebrate the beauty of their community. With its inclusive vibes and focus on building meaningful connections, it’s a space to embrace authenticity, spark joy, and feel truly seen and supported..

events.title: Well of Secrets
events.event_description: I can't tell you what it is - it's a secret

events.title: The Giggle Gauntlet
events.event_description: Dive into the hilarity as comedians and improv enthusiasts try their best to crack you up with quick wit and absurd antics. With costumes, props, and endless creativity, you can join the chaos, create your own skits, or test your ability to keep a straight face. It's all laughs, connections, and pure fun.

events.title: Lemonade Social
events.event_description: Come take a break from setting up your camp and drink something! We have our famous flavored lemonade, or vodka lemonade. Refreshments may also be available!

events.title: Tunnel Of Wonder
events.event_description: Come experience the journey that is the Tunnel of Wonder, now in its 3rd year. Starting after dusk each day, enjoy a walk through experience to delight the senses, and make some wishes to yourself at the end.

events.title: First Fires Open Mic
events.event_description:
Got a song to sing? Instrument to play? Poetry to Slam? Performance of five minutes or less?

Come join our fantastic Open Mic and entertain and be entertained while in the shade.

Some material may contain adult language or themes.

events.title: Haiku? Bless You! A Light-Hearted Poetry Hour
events.event_description: Ever tried to squeeze the universe into 17 syllables? It’s easier than it sounds-and way more fun. Come learn the ancient (and slightly magical) art of haiku in this chill midday workshop. We’ll play with words, count on our fingers, and maybe accidentally become poets. No pressure, no judgment-just some laughs, good vibes, and surprisingly deep thoughts packed into tiny poems. Bring your imagination, your inner weirdo, and a pen.

events.title: Absinthe Tasting
events.event_description: Come learn about the Green Fairy at Drink, Bitch! Marko is demonstrating his yearly tasting and learning session about the ritual and history of Absinthe.

events.title: Prehistoric Pet Adoption
events.event_description: Join Safe Zone and adopt a charming prehistoric pet! Read through all of the different About Me’s and adopt your perfect prehistoric companion today :)

events.title: Time Lock Hair Braiding
events.event_description: Time is an illusion, but your hair can be legendary! Swing by our Time Warp Hair Moment and grab a pop of color that says: "I'm here to play!" with bright vibrant hair extensions. Make memories that defy the clock!

events.title: Y'allville Thick Mart FAT-shion Boutique
events.event_description: Join Y'allville for our Thick Mart FAT-shion Boutique, featuring fun fashions for fat folks of all genders, sized L and above. Donations are enthusiastically accepted any time (the earlier, the better).

events.title: My Tie Mai Tais
events.event_description: An annual favorite. Come enjoy a pretty damn close version of the Trader Vic's 1944 throwback cocktail...but you have to wear a tie. The tie will choose you, with the story to go along with it.  If you've had this combo, you know it's amazing.

events.title: Free Candy Mobile Cart
events.event_description: Roving cart with sweet flavored libations for the adventurous. Free Candy is a roaming bar wagon: a "bagon" that can pop up anywhere at anytime,
events.where_name: Roving cart housed at Drink, Bitch!

events.title: Coffee Happy Hour
events.event_description: Start off your night with a coffee cocktail.  Hang and listen to some music.  Might even get some live jams from blurfect.

events.title: Camp Lead Mixer @ Rita's
events.event_description: Are you a camp lead or camp second and would like to get to know other camp leads/seconds? Over at Rita's, we're closing the bar on Saturday from 1-3 for a camp lead/second mixer. Come have a drink, share experiences, build connections, and vent about that one project that never comes together.

events.title: The Cat Prowl: a Catwalk through Time
events.event_description: Strut your stuff in your fiercest feline fashion as we prowl around the lake! From ancient Egyptian godcats to futuristic space kitties, all feline fashion is welcome on this catwalk through time. As we make our way around the lake we’ll meow at passersby, knock stuff off shelves, chase lasers, and generally be curious little kitties! We’ll circle back to Cat Camp! for a purr-fectly wild dance paw-ty to finish it off.

events.title: Get the Zoomies & Caterwaul about the Good ol' Days
events.event_description:
Most crepuscular creatures like to get at least a good half hour in VERY early almost EVERY morning.
       
🐾 Here a FRAP. There a FRAP! Everywhere, a frap-frap...    ฅ⁠^⁠•⁠ﻌ⁠•⁠^⁠ฅ °o0{ OPEN THE DANG DOOR! }   Just listen to them, singing the song of their Hoomins! (Perhaps they don't get enough attention at Meow-ee-oke?)
"Frapping" which we know more colloquially as zooming, is a natural way for an animal to burn off pent up energy. Many veterinarians agree that these "frenetic random activity periods" occur while both excitable and stressed. Often the simplest way to handle them involves interacting more during the day. 🧶🪶 Maybe we should be checking that the litter box stays clean (LNT yay!) and ask if everyone's been fed a tasty treat BEFORE bed. 🍥🐟  If you can't beat 'em, swallow some pride🦁, take a leap🐆 and join the hot streak🐅.

events.title: Mini triathlon!
events.event_description: This event is fit for all, whether you’re a star triathlete, or a novice mall walker. You can even do the buddy system and relay this race with 1 person to swim, one to bike, and another to run, hop or mosey. We will start at the effigy, swim across the lake, and run from north beach, south back towards effigy, and finally bike a lap around the lake for a mini triathlon of less than 2 miles travel. Cross the finish line to receive your race medal, then wander to Syncytium at Westfield for drinks and more fun activities.

events.title: Midnight Crystal Cave
events.event_description: On a *random* night when the clock strikes midnight, a cave will appear on the lake. Venture in and discover what’s inside ✨

events.title: Midnight Pizza
events.event_description: Lunch Lady Tony serves up nostalgic cheese pizza

events.title: Rita's Wet T-Shirt Relay
events.event_description: A tacky classic for everyone. Bring a team of four. We're hosting a relay race where the baton is a soaking, 2XL t-shirt. Hot chocolate and hot cider will be available after the race.

events.title: Cool Beans Smoke Sesh
events.event_description: Chill out with your fellow beans! Bring a joint to pass and come cool off in the bean pod :)

events.title: Internalizing the Universe With Deadly Harmony
events.event_description: Internalize harmony with warm-ups, forms and exercises.  Hosted by Ketevan from Drink, Bitch! at locations around the lake.
events.where_name: Check with Drink, Bitch! for location. Look for the flag. Probably in a quiet place near camp.

events.title: Lincoln's birthday shenanigans!
events.event_description: Lincoln just turned 7! Come and celebrate his birthday with us. Chocolate and vanilla cupcakes and snacks will be available.

events.title: Coffee Just For You
events.event_description: Let me make a fresh cup of pour-over coffee.  Just for you.  My mom made you a blueberry scone too.

events.title: Tea Time
events.event_description: Come to Aunt Marsha's Bed and Breakfast to stay in our front room and drink tea with us.

events.title: 🧸B.E.A.R. Meet 🐻
events.event_description:
Boundaries
Empowerment
Action
Resilience

We're not here to vibe-we're here to survive (with style).
Self-defense for the soft, the spicy, the sacred, and the scrappy.

💥 Queer-centered, everyone-welcome
💬 Come learn to say "no" with your whole body
🚫 Not a fight club
✅ A boundary-affirming, strike-positive, consent-rooted skills share
🧠 You don’t need to be "tough"-you just need to be B.E.A.R.able

Come get grounded. Come get loud. Come get free.
✨ Session info below 👇
🕙 10a
📍 Cosmic Disco

events.title: Crazy Morning People Get Bendy
events.event_description: Feel like loosening up first thing in the morning?  I do.  I'll be there.  Stretching.  Nothing organized, but follow along if you want.  Is it too early?  Probably.

events.title: Coffee Tasting
events.event_description: Tasting Coffee

events.title: Cumbia Dance Lesson at MEOW*TOWN
events.event_description: CU-CU-CU-CUMBIA! Bring your paws down to MEOW*TOWN and become a Cumbiero! Learn the basic steps and some partner work for the Columbian rhythm, as well as a brief history of this diverse Latin music. Beginners welcome.

events.title: Ducks Dicks and ....Grapes?
events.event_description: Do you enjoy ducks? Do you enjoy being a dick? and most importantly...do you have any grapes? If so come on by to bring out your inner yellow rubber duck. Embrace the ducking good time playing a game of Duck Duck Dildo and other duck shenanigans.

events.title: Flint-style Coneys and Nachos & Cheese
events.event_description: Flint-style Coneys and Nachos & Cheese while supplies last.

events.title: OSHA Union Sign-ups
events.event_description: The Office of Shenanigans, Hijinks, and Antics is looking for folks who want to join our union! Every Member will take a drug test, receive an orange kilt to decorate, a laminated union card, and some stickers to hand out during the event! while supplies last.

events.title: Frequencia Fire Pit
events.event_description: Stop by and enjoy the fire.  We have some benches, but feel free to bring your own chair.  Ya never know what pop-up events might happen.  Could be a surprise open mic?  Could be a DJ or two.  Could just be a relaxing fire to just sit and enjoy.  All are welcome!!!

events.title: Ancient Egypt Funerary Necklaces
events.event_description: Come through the doorway of time to make a funeral necklace to wear to the afterlife with genuine gemstone, wood, and bone beads that replicate those of ancient times. Learn the meaning and mysticism of death jewelry and create your own!

events.title: Jerk Church
events.event_description: Members of the Third Chapter of the Church of the Jerk (Minneapolis) will be hosting an afternoon service at Lakes of Fire. A bit of a folk/punk hootnanny with loud singing and hollaring and maybe a sad song or two. Bring your instruments, your voice, and something to share if you like. Wear your Sunday best, or don't. We don't care. We're Jerks. Come be one too.

events.title: 420 Smoke Sesh
events.event_description: Join us every day for a blunt or a joint at 4:20pm!

events.title: Tune-In Thursday
events.event_description:
Stop by Frequencia for a Sound Blessing, listen to the plants sing, spend some time at the craft table and make some art or learn about Tensor Rings!

The Bar will be open and we'll be all plugged in and ready for anything!  Bring your guitar, clarinet, or juice-harp and show up what you got!

events.title: Aeon & Cyn's Pantless Wedding Party Favors
events.event_description: If you missed Aeon & Cyn's Multiversal Wedding last year, fear not! You can travel back in time to become a guest of our Pantsless Wedding Party. Please take a wristband as a piece of our love to keep with you <3

events.title: Meow-ee-oke! (formerly Catraoke)
events.event_description: Formerly known as "Catraoke" but nobody could pronounce it.  Come CATerwaul with us by meowing the lyrics of your favorite karaoke tunes, or even invent a feline parody!  Purrrticipants can earn their own set of light-up cat ears!

events.title: Happy Hour With the Freaqs!
events.event_description: The Freaq Tavern opens for fun & games (and drinks!)

events.title: Ice Breaker Bingo Social Hour
events.event_description: Do you struggle socializing? Do you want a chance to meet some other burners with less pressure? Come get your bingo card and get to know your fellow Burners. Beverages to be provided by T.H.C. and Sad Kids Club (medicated, spirited, and virgin)

events.title: Magic the Gathering (commander/draft)
events.event_description: We will be hosting Drafts to the first 8 people interested daily. Due to other commitments we will need to be getting these going on time. We will also be hosting open Magic play. commander is the style of choice, but feel free to bring what you got and see if anyone else matches up!

events.title: Root Beer (Floats?)
events.event_description: Come cool off with a nice glass of homemade Root Beer! If we're lucky, a certain Kraken will stop by with vanilla ice cream to upgrade your treat! (sugar free will be available) while supplies last

events.title: They/Them Titty Bar
events.event_description: Come join us for the famous intergalactic gathering of Non-Binary Burners! Casual afternoon cocktails and mocktails from your favorite non-binary bartenders from space, with fruit and yogurt parfait buffet. Now featuring The Striptarium our 10ft octagonal human terrarium complete with stripper pole!

events.title: Discovering New Stories Together
events.event_description: Always want to tell a story? To spin up a world out of nothing? Using some simple but fun games, we’ll all start with basic prompts and in no time at all a story will come together. Even if you don’t think this is the sort of thing you’re good at, I promise you can come and contribute and have a good time. Feel free to ask to play anytime Pumpkin's at camp throughout the burn if you cant now.

events.title: Grand Opening Wine and Cheese Night
events.event_description: Come to Aunt Marsha's Bed and Breakfast to sample our yummy wine and cheese and celebrate our inaugural year.

events.title: Space Buns and Cuppa Tea
events.event_description: Step through a doorway in time and find yourself in a cozy corner of the cosmos. I’ll swirl your hair into stellar space buns while you sip a peppermint cuppa tea and chat about this timeline...or any other. Come for the buns, stay for the time-bending tea and tender vibes. 🌌☕🌀

events.title: 420 Hot Box
events.event_description: We upgraded our tent his year and we have room for so many more people! Come celebrate the last day of the burn by hot boxing our tent! Be ready to sign your Consent form. Be sure to get here early, the tent will be sealed by 4:15 to start at 4:20.

events.title: Wednesday Welcome Home Party
events.event_description:
Tired of setting up camp?  Need a snack?

Come by Frequencia for a break and meet the Freaqs!  Enjoy a fresh steamed hot dog (Someone said Pups is bringing some of his Hot Sauces!) and grab a drink from the Freaq Tavern.

Get a sage bath, sound blessing, or just chill in our large dome, The Vibratorium, and listen to some music and take a load off…

events.title: Coney Dogs
events.event_description: Come enjoy a Detroit Classic, The Coney Dog!!!! Typically, a Detroit Coney has chili, mustard, and onions, but we will have a few more toppings to choose from!

events.title: Portals of Connection
events.event_description: Ready to reach out through space and time? Each portal displays dynamic imagery controlled by someone standing at another portal, creating a playful and visual conversation between strangers. Experiment with movement, light, and perspective as you co-create ever-changing scenes with fellow explorers.

events.title: Infusion Lounge
events.event_description: Stop by our infusion lounge for hot tea and hot cocoa, baked goods, and mellow tunes to soothe your soul before you head out for the night.

events.title: Beachside Psytrance
events.event_description: Beachside Psytrance. Bring a swimsuit

events.title: Wee Effigy
events.event_description: Come by to watch the mini effigies burn.

events.title: Peanut Butter Jelly Time!
events.event_description: Stop by Feeling Jelly for fried/grilled PB&J sandwitches, PB&J shots, and good company!  Exactly what burners need to start their evening!  Jelly donuts will also be available in an on available basis!

events.title: SPARK SCOUTS Root Beer Brewing
events.event_description: Calling All Spark Scouts!!! Come and learn how to make your own Root Beer and learn a little history! Every scout will receive a patch and be allowed to fill a large water bottle with Root Beer to share with their camp. (sugar free will be available) while supplies last

events.title: Wake N' Bake
events.event_description: Are you an early riser? Come by T.H.C. for a Wake N' Bake! Even if no one in our camp is awake, there will be everything you need for an early morning smoke sesh! (events start at 10AM but you can come as early as you want!)

events.title: Kips Korner
events.event_description:
Come paint a miniature DND figurine of your own as a friend to join you on your adventures around the lake.
This is an unsupervised event. The supplies will be out during the scheduled hours, weather permitting.

events.title: Smoky Bubs
events.event_description: Where smoke meets bubble (hookah lounge)

events.title: Bud-E Bench
events.event_description: Interested in meeting someone new? Struggle to introduce yourself? Try the brand new Bud-E Bench!!! Take a seat on the bench and when someone else joins you, grab a blunt and go on a walk! The idea is that you will hang out until your blunt is done. Then you decide if you'd like to keep hanging out or go your separate ways!

events.title: Slime Time
events.event_description: Step back into childhood and embrace your inner mad scientist. Craft your own slime while grooving to live, slime-inspired grooves and music from the 80's and 90's. Pair your creation with a happy hour drink and let the good vibes flow!

events.title: Specimen Station
events.event_description: Want to take a break from art created by humans and see what mother nature has to offer? Come by The Lab and take a gander through the microscope to see some flora and fauna up close. Like REALLY up close.

events.title: The Cosmic Bureau of Lost Things
events.event_description:
Hey there magpies! You want the stuff?
Cosmic bureau is the place to peruse for Materials Out Of Place from outer space.
Give a fresh home to this and that. Or send a once loved item to wander.
When the sun is up, peep it at your leisure.

events.title: Sensory "Break Room" Open
events.event_description: All are welcome to come take a sensory break in our enclosed sensory relief room, as long as you do so quietly. Bring your coffee and relax, or don't, just do it quietly.

events.title: Mall Rock You Like a Hurricane
events.event_description: Calling all you Mallrats and Bodacious Babes, give someone else a turn at Sam Goody, quit sneaking peeks at the Spencer’s naughty section, and come join us for a totally rad event over at the food court at the Still Bayou drink trailer. We will be offering the most righteous of hot soft pretzels and some fantabulous hurricanes. This popup is going to be the most stellar, tubular, schweet, and salty event at the lake.

events.title: OSHA Lingerie Fashion Show!!
events.event_description: SEEKING MODELS!! Come strut your stuff down our runway! Wear your own lingerie and come look through all of our OSHA themed accessories to make a unique look for the fashion show! Feel free to bring your own safety gear as well!

events.title: Best Bloody Mary's evah
events.event_description: A time honored tradition at Lakes. Show us your cup!  Come get your WI style bloody Mary's with meat and cheese here. We do have burnable Dixie cups if you just can't stand mixing your bloody with everything else.

events.title: Wall of Jelly
events.event_description:
Feeling some feels?  Got something you are envious, or down right jelly of?  Stop by our Walll of Jelly, write a note, draw some art, get the feels out!
The Wall of Jelly can carry that weight for you! 
Kind inclusive participation only please!

events.title: Graveyard Bar and Food
events.event_description: Come by the Graveyard anytime to enjoy a spooky bar space and chill ambiance. When we feel like it we will serve frozen lemonade, cocktails, hotdogs and popcorn.

events.title: Conclave
events.event_description: Watch the fire spinners perform their art prior to the burning of the effigy.

events.title: Fackin’ Dino ridin!
events.event_description:
BRACE YOUR LOINS, Y’ALL AND REPEAT AFTER ME!!!
Fackin Dinosaurs!!
Professor Murphy’s bringing livestock to Lakes!

Last year, the Professor scooped up Cordelia, the last Gigantasnarkyasaurus, from Mogli-that weird little dude from The Island of Dr. Moreau-in a high stakes, illegal poker game held in the seedy underbelly of Dubai. 
It was sketchy, and smelled like regret and cheap tequila, but he came home with Cordelia, and brought her to Lakes last year.  

Since then, she’s been feelin’ a tad lonely, so the ruggedly handsome Professor Murphy set to work in an illegal laboratory-think glow-in-the-dark test tubes, and a  cackling intern with a bad leg and a name no mortal can pronounce (who’s definitely on a watchlist)-where he, with moderate success and a few minor mutations, cloned FOUR MORE of these prehistoric badasses, to make 
THE FLEET OF FIVE 

Gigantasnarkyasauruseseses! and they’re coming to Lakes!

Wanna ride one? 

OH, HONEY, GET. ON. IT! 

They came to f*ck around and find out. Did you?  
Pro tip: avoid eye contact.
events.where_name: Could be anywhere, aka where the party is…

events.title: Inflatable Costume Invasion
events.event_description: Show up in your inflatable costume at inflatable Camp and enjoy the inflatable vortex and garden. Hang out on the beach of San Escobar and shake your blown up booty on the dance floor! All ages event.

events.title: Loud BOOM!
events.event_description: Thirty minutes warning that the big show will start at the Effigy.

events.title: Coffee Ritual
events.event_description: The Pope of Coffee shall blesspresso The Holy Of Holies: the most theatrical brewing method ever devised. The acolytes will serve the Holy Liquid unto the congregation, who shall raise the sacrament to the east, and in unison, recite the litany "God, I needed that!" A blend of cafe'ths such as Press-byterian, Buzzentine, Latte-Day Saints, Sipiscopal, and even Atheismericano.

events.title: Visionary Violin by Dixon
events.event_description: You've never heard violin like this!  A 100% live electric violin concert, nothing pre-recorded, no samples, no beats.  Join us, be inspired, bliss out on a musical journey as seen at over 1,000 concerts across North America and beyond.

events.title: Vibratorium Sound Bath
events.event_description: Come chill under our open-air dome-like Vibratorium for a relaxing sound bath and vibrational tune-up featuring bowls, bells, chimes, forks, and gong! We have mats and pillows or bring your own!

events.title: singing in rounds workshop
events.event_description: come for the sound bath, stay for the singing!  we'll be doing perpetual canons (think "row row row your boat" but leveled up. no experience required.

events.title: Loud BOOM! again
events.event_description: This is your fifteen minute warning that the big show will start soon.

events.title: Throbtronic Community Resonator From Space!!!
events.event_description: Custom fabricated community synthesizer. Twisty knobs, sine waves, sounds, You get the idea. FROM SPACE!!!

events.title: May the Quartz Be With You
events.event_description: Quartz Talks with Tamalin. This Phantom Quartz Queen is bringing out favorite pieces from her personal collection. Learn about various formations of quartz crystal points and their metaphysical uses. Get a crystalline energy download and shake the default dross off your aura Dora. Bring your quartz for a Quartz reading. A facet of Frequencia's Welcome Home Party going on.

events.title: Side Quest Guild Board
events.event_description: Time has fractured and only you can help! The Druids have lost their bears and need assistance! It is IMPERATIVE that you build an adventure party if you're to survive the burn. Join the Order of the Fowl Knights - don't be a chicken! The Camp Side Quest Guild board is open to all any hour of the day - what adventure will call to you?

events.title: Tarot to Go
events.event_description: Want a tarot reading without the awkwardness of an intense knowing stare? Why not take your tarot to go? In each envelope, you will receive 3 cards from a variety of tarot decks, and 3 corresponding printouts detailing your inevitable fate. Precise selection determined by the Prognosticator 5000, so you know it's accurate!

events.title: Tea & Tarot Party
events.event_description: Bring your cup and fill it with love at the self-service tea bar. Our resident Oracle, Tamalin will be gifting short Tarot or quartz readings. Fellow divinators welcome to join in gifting your skillz.

events.title: the Time Warp Lounge
events.event_description: Step through our Doorway in Time, Daddio! Lounge to the groovy beats, Diana! Colorful images of decades past will surround you with images of lives gone by. Wow your eyeballs through the magic of stereo-scopic viewers! Now you're clicking with 3-D!

events.title: Cloak and Stagger Tavern
events.event_description: Alcoholic and NA craft cocktails, snarky bar keeps and witchy tavern wenches, mysterious quest givers from the beyond, and much more. Join us for magic, mischief, and adventure!

events.title: Cocktail Hour at the Time Warp Lounge
events.event_description: Hey Hepcats and Kittens jet on over and put your paw pads up in the lounge. Groove to the bongo beat and cool that brain-pan with a kick from a Kentucky Mule.

events.title: Camp Tramp Stamp Coffee Revamp
events.event_description:
Come start your morning with us the only way we know how-with caffeine and sweet treats! We invite you to join us for a steamy cup of coffee at the Camp Tramp Stamp Coffee Revamp! We’ll have all the coffee fixin's, sweet breakfast bites, and for those embracing the hair of the dog lifestyle-Irish Cream and screwdrivers will be on hand. You bring the mug, we’ll bring the magic. 

We are in the keyhole at KE4.

events.title: Fire works on the Peninsula
events.event_description: Fireworks will be going off the tip of the Peninsula and lighting up the night sky.

events.title: Shibari 101 with Siren & Atreyu
events.event_description: The Midwest Rope Slut Connection of Siren & Atreyu will cover the basics of starting with Shibari. Basic column ties and frictions will be covered to help build some of the most common patterns. Negotiation and pre-tying considerations will be covered as well.  Bring 7-8 m rope lengths if you have them. There will be limited quantities of rope to borrow for the class. The workshop can be taken with or without a partner.

events.title: Stitch N' Bitch
events.event_description:
Are you angry at the government?  Dissatisfied with the human experience as a whole? Would you like to radically express that anger while stabbing something? Come to Stitch n Bitch and commiserate with us! Needles, thread, patches and punk music will be provided all you need is to bring something to attach your creation to and something to bitch about. All fiber arts/crafts welcome! Boogie Woogie Cabaret 
Sites 125-126

events.title: Grass whistling workshop & symphony
events.event_description: Come make the gentle rustling of blades of green into a grand orchestral experience. Master the art of grass blowing, transforming the land into a stage for nature's abundant wind instruments known for their tranquil banshee-like screech. Find the leaf totem & blanket by the Twinkle Temple between lake and Syncytium

events.title: Rainbow Pipe Dream
events.event_description: Come test your plumbing skills at the Rainbow Pipe Dream interactive art piece! Connect the pipes, and see how many water wheels you can spin!

events.title: Stuffy monster mash workshop
events.event_description: Want to create the mutant stuffie of your dreams? Join us for an afternoon of stuffed friend surgery where we disassemble and stitch to create a new monster you'll love. Feel free to bring your own stuffies or use some of ours. No sewing experience required. Meet at the shady dome

events.title: The Glory Bowl
events.event_description: Get on your knees and eat up, champ! Join us for our glory hole of food where you will receive our delicious pickles, hot dogs, and eclairs (vegan and gluten free options available). All ages welcome; minors will be served, but not through the hole. Available until our supplies run out!

events.title: A Human Told me it is called palm reading
events.event_description: Hello I am aether cowboy I would like to meet you and read your hands a human called it "alien palm reading" in still bayou

events.title: DJ Open Decks
events.event_description: A physical sign up sheet will be available for this event all day during the day before this event.

events.title: Effigy Fireworks
events.event_description: Fireworks will be going off on the Effigy

events.title: Herbal Tea Party
events.event_description: Step in for a moment and grab some tea or stay a few and chat about plants! Herbal tea offerings to include Fae Tea, Floral Tea, and Soothing Tea.

events.title: Sign Up For DJ Open Decks
events.event_description: A physical sign-up list will be available at Cat Camp! all day prior to the noon - 3pm open decks event on Friday.

events.title: The LOF Mayoral Debate & Town Hall
events.event_description:
Got a gripe? Come ask the Mayoral candidates their plan to solve it at first ever LOF Mayoral debate & Town Hall.  

Let the people be heard!!

Want to run for Mayor?  Show up ready to debate & address voters from the town hall.  

Vote Nancy and Vote Often.

events.title: Drink, Bitch! On the go: Crap’tastic Karaoke
events.event_description:
Don’t know the lyrics but believe you do?  

Can’t hit a note if a mailperson gave it to you?  

Who needs to carry a tune when you’re carrying a microphone!!  

Come and sing karaoke with us!  

You can’t be as bad as we are.
events.where_name: Walking around the lake with the Rice Krispie cart.

events.title: Atomic Badminton
events.event_description: Come by the kinetic lab and unleash your inner physicist on the court. Grab a racket and smash some particles (birdies) in a fast-paced game of Atomic Badminton.

events.title: Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears [burn]
events.event_description:
Throughout the week, people have helped us build the Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears. Tonight we hold a solemn ceremony and release the hurt.
And stay after to roast s'mores that something sweet may rise from the ashes as we continue into story hour.

events.title: Rainbow surprise
events.event_description:
Colors swirl and laughter grows. What hides beneath the bright rainbow? Come if you dare, stay if you can. Expect the unexpected… no, there’s no plan.

Between Syn & the lake... find the rainbow

events.title: Burning of the Temple
events.event_description: We have written our thoughts and prayers on the temple and now it is time to let them go and be lifted up as smoke while we somberly watch the temple go up in flames.

events.title: Authentic Relating
events.event_description: Join us as we play a variety of Authentic Relating games that involve exploring others' worlds and speaking your truth.  Connect with like-minded people interested in having fun with curiosity, self-discovery, and saying what we actually mean.

events.title: Just the Tip - Times COCKtails
events.event_description:
We are back (to the future)! Slinging delicious high-quality COCKtails from various time periods - all available in a non-alc option!
Come for the drinks, stay for the penis shaped literally everything. 8==D

events.title: Bike Party!
events.event_description: Grab your bike and join us for a social group ride around the lake! CoolJets will be leading the procession on his disco bike so we can show everyone our sick rides while cruising to some sweet jams. After the ride we will stop and dance party a bit if we're feeling frisky. Hope to see you there!

events.title: Effigy Ignition
events.event_description: The Effigy will be lit on fire and burn until it is consumed.

events.title: Swing Dance Class!
events.event_description:
Are you a fellow Swing dancer? Have you never Swing danced before but always wanted to try? Do you have no idea what Swing dance is but are open to trying new things? 
Then join us for this one-hour session as we practice some Swing dancing moves and tricks! All experience levels are welcome; no partner is necessary to join.

events.title: Plant Nerd Talk
events.event_description: Are you bonkers about botany? Do you have a hard time getting your fill of chlorophyll? Feel like there is no re-leaf in sight? The green faeries can help. We have so many seeds in our sanctuary that a plant nerd like you is probably going to wet their plants in excitement. Come and stamen a while and talk plants with us. We'll make you feel right at rhizome.

events.title: Moxibustion at the Gates
events.event_description: Moxabustion is a Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) technique, burning mugwort stick at acupuncture points referred to as "gates": specific areas of the body associated with health and energy flow.

events.title: Panda Emporium
events.event_description:
Our name has changed but our mission remains the same.  The Panda Emporium returns this year providing those necessary, hard-to-find, and late-night items.  We have cigs, lighters, TP, antacids, tampons, floss, water, gum, sanitizer, wipes, and much, much, more! 
At posted times meet Poppa Panda, view his ecumenical journey, and receive his blessings.
Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

events.title: Leather and Limericks
events.event_description:
Leather and Limericks
by Michael Hartnett "Limerick"
Do you want to build a leather festival harness with pouches to carry your essentials? We have designed these so no experience or skill with leatherwork is needed. Come to the Nexus and get your build on!  Get there early, seats are very limited!!!

events.title: Stitch and B!tch tea party
events.event_description: Calling all crafters! Bring something to stitch or something to b!tch and come join us for a magical tea party. (Some fiber crafts supplies available for those interested in something new)

events.title: Fake Tatoos
events.event_description: Come get tatted up!

events.title: Garage Band
events.event_description: We're getting the band back together. Practice starts at 3.  We're working on Down on the Corner, Sweet Child O' Mine, and probably some other stuff.  Instruments are all set up.  Let's crank it up and jam!

events.title: Open Jam space
events.event_description: Full band set-up.  Drums, guitars, bass, keyboard, microphone, and song-books for collaboration.  Open invitation to play.

events.title: Sing-a-long Play-a-long
events.event_description: Bring voices, instruments, hands to clap, a listening ear, dancing feet.  We'll build fun, community, and connection in the shared cocreation of music.

events.title: Sparkly Hair Tinsel
events.event_description: Bling up your Do!

events.title: Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears [build]
events.event_description: Time passes and not everything we experience is happy. It's an important part of life, but it can accumulate into an oppressive, overwhelming glob. Sometimes you just want to let some of that go. Help us build our Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears.  Write things you would like to release on the pieces you use to build the Cathedral. On Friday night, we'll hold a solemn ceremony burning the Cathedral, letting go of some of the hurt.

events.title: Center Stage
events.event_description: Share a story or a poem, play us a song, or just step up to the mic awkwardly while we stare at you for a bit.  We're here to take you in, support, and love you.  We have instruments, song and poetry books, and story prompts if you are wanting inspiration.

events.title: Buugeng gang flow workshop
events.event_description: Come join our buugeng gang and learn some cool flow moves (limited supplies available!)

events.title: Unwind your Burn with Big Kris
events.event_description:
Feeling stiff, sore, or overloaded from the burn (or life in general)? Come decompress with Big Kris in a guided session of Somatic Movement designed to gently unwind your body’s tension patterns through subtle movement and breath.
This 50-minute session begins with an introduction to somatic movement- how your nervous system holds stress, and how mindful movement can help release it. Then you’ll be guided through a series of gentle, floor-based, seated or standing exercises to help you tune into your body, soften chronic holding patterns, and restore fluid, easeful motion.
Whether you’re working through pain, recovering from overexertion, or simply want to feel more at home in your body, this workshop will leave you grounded, open, and reconnected. It’s also great for dancers, flow artists, and movers looking to increase mobility and coordination by letting go of unnecessary tension.
Come once or return each day- each session builds and deepens. No experience needed. Just bring your body, breath, and maybe a towel or blanket to lay on.

events.title: Hot Dog Hootenanny
events.event_description: Wiener lovers, unite! The Hotdog Hootenanny is here to make your taste buds do the cha-cha. Bring your friends, your stretchy pants, and maybe a napkin or 10.

events.title: Send Your Baggage to Space (Emotional Baggage Claim)
events.event_description: Visit our boat hull to write down or draw things you need to release or let go of, and place your sentiments in our confidential emotional baggage briefcase. Using alien technology, we will dispose of your baggage by launching it into the sun (burning it).

events.title: Camp Saicin Hot Sauce & Snack Buffet
events.event_description: Step through the Portal of Heat and transform your bland burner meals into fiery flavor fiestas! We'll have a variety of sauces and snacks to awaken your senses and open your third tastebud. If the doorway of time is open, you may also find sandwiches and beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) to help may your journey around the lake a little spicier!

events.title: Nighttime Croquet and Bocce
events.event_description: Old-World lawn games like croquet and bocce ball lacked one critical feature -- the equipment was only visible in the daytime.  Our equipment, however, emits its own photons!

events.title: Alien Dong Darts
events.event_description:
Toss around some Alien Dongs to see if you can get them into the Galactic Supermassive... er, um hole.

Our Dong Dart board is new and improved this year featuring updated artwork!

As long as there are Sexy Space Raiders From Space at camp, the Alien Dongs will be available for tossing.

events.title: Kiki kyklos
events.event_description: Conclave

events.title: Burner Passport Agency and Freakquent Flyer Lounge
events.event_description: Chart your next intergalactic adventure, while our travel agents personalize the most widely accepted form of photo ID in the known burniverse! New and returning travelers are invited to this immersive VIP experience, including out of this world plinko prizes!

events.title: Chaos Closet
events.event_description: Costumes, funky clothing finds and other goodies to adorn your beautiful body with!

events.title: Firewater Lounge Snow Cones!!  One chance to cool down—or spiral out.
events.event_description: Snow cones that tease-virgin if you must, spiked if you dare. Come get sticky.

events.title: Lakes of Fire Video Game Tournament
events.event_description: Come try your hand at the EXCLUSIVE Lakes of Fire video game and play Lakes of Fire: A Retro Adventure of Dubious Realism! Take an hour and play against your fellow burners to see who might be the best on the lake!

events.title: Blues Dance Crash Course
events.event_description: Want to learn how to dance to with a Blues Aesthetic?  This is the place to be!  Come join the juke joint and pulse with us.

events.title: Postcards From the Future
events.event_description: Visit our crashed airplane to engage in time travel - by sending a postcard to your future self, or a future friend. Decorate, write, and address mail that we will put actual postage on and send sometime after Lakes ends!

events.title: Storytelling with Shae
events.event_description: Step into our shared headspace where moments bend and memories blur - where a single story can transport you to another era or bring the past rushing into now.  Settle in and prepare to travel farther than you expected - without ever leaving your seat.

events.title: 20s Speakeasy Costume Party
events.event_description: This Thursday at Chill Camp, slip behind the hidden door at The Gallery and step into The Chilled Cup - a frosty 1920s speakeasy come alive. Dress to impress in your best flapper, dapper, or Gatsby-inspired attire. Sip cool mocktails, groove to smooth jazz, and soak up the vintage vibes all night long

events.title: Speakeasy Serenade
events.event_description: Think you can’t sing? Perfect. This Friday at Chill Camp, find the hidden door to the Chilled Glass Bar and dive into vintage vibes, flowing mocktails, and plenty of libations to loosen your pipes. Whether you’re channeling your inner jazz legend or just having fun, the mic is yours. Dress sharp, sing loud, and let the good times roll

events.title: Speakeasy Soft Launch
events.event_description: They say there’s a secret door behind The Gallery at Chill Camp. That if you find it, and slip inside, there’s a bar waiting - soft lights, mocktails, and quiet company. No signs. No noise. Just a hidden lounge opening its doors for the first night of the burn. Come early. Come gently. Come find us.

events.title: Rorchest Prints Making
events.event_description:
Join us for a creative and affirming chest print making event where all bodies are celebrated as beautiful works of art. This inclusive gathering invites participants of all genders and identities to explore self-expression through the powerful medium of body printing.

Using safe, washable, non-toxic paints, we’ll guide you through creating a one-of-a-kind chest print on canvas that you can take home as a vibrant reminder of your uniqueness and strength. All materials are provided, and privacy stations will be available for those who prefer a more personal space.

events.title: Brunchgasm
events.event_description: On Saturday come to our camp and sample our delicious breakfast treats and slather yourself in the flesh of Hambo! Delight in tasty breakfast meats, green eggs and spam, Philly regional favorite scrapple, or decorate your own cosmic waffle at our diy wafflebar! Top it off with strawberry sangria, bloody marys, mimosas, fruit juices or ice-chilled citrus mint infused spa water. Come and join us for time traveling feast of epic proportions!

events.title: Special Sunrise Service
events.event_description: Join us at Camp The Sky (or a remote location with a better view) for our special sunrise service. party through the night, or get a head start on packing up, we don't care, we just enjoy the sky.

events.title: Boinger Raffle
events.event_description: Raffling off some boingers! Join in and maybe you'll win.

events.title: 99 Bottles of Beer on the Wall
events.event_description: Join in our famous 99 bottles of beer (& seltzer) on the wall sing along event with our specially made Wall 'o Beer!

events.title: Picklebacks and asscracks at Crappy Bar
events.event_description: Come by for some picklebacks and ass cracks at the Crappy bar. Cabela Bob will be hosting and toasting while the sun is roasting. Look for the sign that says...Sorry... We're open!!

events.title: Feast with the Fae
events.event_description: You already know you shouldn't let anything from the faeries touch your lips, but refusing their hospitality might be risky. Join us for a frolicsome 'feast' from multiple worlds!  Timing is floaty.

events.title: Big Lebowski White Russian Party
events.event_description: Come worship "The Dude" and have a white Russian (or two)

events.title: Rocky Horror Live Shadowcast
events.event_description: A live shadowcast of the Rocky Horror Picture Show (Friday at midnight!)  Bring your best snarky comments and do the Timewarp with us, again!

events.title: Pre-effigy Happy hour: Post- burn Crappy Hour hosted by Cat Camp!
events.event_description: Cheap booze n fire.... What could possibly go wrong? Fire up with fire water at the Crappy bar for pre-burn happy hour. Then... Come by afterwards for post burn... Crappy Hour.  Sorry... We're still open!! 😺😁

events.title: Toga toga toga kickoff mixer at Crappy Bar
events.event_description: Crappy Bar with Cat Camp kicks off lakes with a toga party mixer for singles , doubles, throuples n more. Wear your fanciest toga and bring your cheesiest lines to dance and mingle like a Pringle. 8 til ???. Toga ..toga!!

events.title: Mood Indigo
events.event_description: Enjoy some relaxing clarinet music from Indigo Clarinet-and, if you would like, bring your own acoustic instrument to join in some eclectic pick-up improv.  (All skill levels welcome; quality not guaranteed.)  Please no amplified sound.

events.title: FLOW MY GOSH! A FIRE JAM!
events.event_description: Come witness and share your artistry in your favorite fire safe look. We'll have a playlist going, but you can also request a specific song to perform to. Always have a safety! LET'S BURN!

events.title: Shirt Cockers n free the knockers!!
events.event_description: We at the Crappy bar wishing to acknowledge and recognize Long time burner tradition of shirtcocking and free knocking ( see critical tits bike ride) with a little dance your tail off with fine economy liquor and the worst of sound systems. Anybody got a boombox?!

events.title: Black Rock City Film Festival (BRCFF)
events.event_description: Come see last year’s winning films, and learn how to enter your own film this year. The BRCFF is the only film festival that is dedicated to promoting Burning Man’s 10 principles.  Come dressed in your best and walk the red carpet.

events.title: You Choose It Double Feature
events.event_description: Our classic returning movie night hosted by our very own Hambo, time traveling space pirate pig! Yarrrr-oink! Lakes of Fire attendees will choose the films we show via a Facebook poll in addition to live voting on site.

events.title: Sunset Viewing Party
events.event_description: Join us at Camp The Sky for our traditional, daily, sunset viewing party. Wear your favorite sky themed clothes, and celebrate the symphony in the sky with us.

events.title: Daily Themed Happy Hour Through the Decades
events.event_description: Get your time traveling pants on and stop by our Sleepy Pickle Apothecary for our daily decade themed happy hour! From margaritas to daiquiris, grasshoppers, bloody marys, and even cocktails we can't name (what the hell is a Harvey Wallbanger anyway??) spin a wheel to select your decade or pick your favorite. Take a break from your portal jumping and chill out to the soundstracks of disco, goth / nuwave, rap, metal and more. We also will have mocktails and all the knicknacks and cheese and snacks to gear up for your journey through time!

events.title: Cho Cho in da Hausa
events.event_description: Come, check me out at San Escobar. I’ll provide beats and vibes from the motherland viva!!!!

events.title: Piñata Pregame
events.event_description: Looking for a little boost to kick off Lakes? We’ll be handing out piñata sugar cookies. Inside each cookie will be an uplifting message to get you going on your Lakes journey. A few lucky individuals will receive special messages that unlock drink upgrades during the Slime Time happy hours.

events.title: Hydration Station
events.event_description: DRINK WATER!!  Don't let the dusty trail get you dehydrated - just swing by Basement Fiasco to fill up your cup and cool off in our comfortable basement.  Clean water, sometimes flavored, will be available any time of day or night at our hydration station.

events.title: Scovill’age: Spicy Foods & Drinks
events.event_description: Come enjoy increasingly spicy chicken and vegan nuggets, ask and answer silly questions, polish it off with a shot of spicy vodka. Debuting Pajams Jams special selection and Malört hot sauce!
events.where_name: Open camping - look for Scovill’age sign

events.title: Cats to the Future 5k Run
events.event_description: Grab your flux capacitor, Tardis, or time turner and your finest feline flair - it’s time to race through time with the Cats to the Future 5K! From ancient Egypt’s sacred cats to cyberpunk robo-kitties of the year 3000, we’ll sprint, strut, and stroll through timelines unknown of early morning haze. Costumes encouraged: past lives, future paws, space cats, or time-traveling tabbies, or just a pair of shorts will do. Whether you’re a speed demon or a chill cheetah, all timelines converge at the finish line. Meow is the moment! We will meet at the greeters, do two laps around the lake and finish back at the greeter's station. This is not a race, and this event will not qualify you for the Boston Marathon, so take your time -- literally and figuratively. Afterward, join us to go hunt coffee and brunch, or head home for a cat nap.

events.title: Dungeons and DJ’S “Fetishized Friday “
events.event_description:
Open dungeon to dance ,play, and negotiate your junkies dreams 

Bring out your best fetish dress

events.title: Angel Walk
events.event_description: Heaven is on earth! 😇 Walk through the love tunnel and allow yourself to receive love and appreciation through thoughtful words and gentle touch (optional). 💖

events.title: Build Your Own Trail Mix Bar
events.event_description: Come get tasty nuts for your mouth at Basement Fiasco!  We have a scrumptious collection of nuts, dried fruits, and other munchies available throughout the day to keep you fueled up as you explore Lakes.  Bring your own container or scoop into your hands - whichever you choose, you won't be disappointed by our salty nuts.

events.title: Spark Scouts -Burner Kids Quest Station
events.event_description:
BURNER KIDS QUEST 
Are you a Burner Kid? Then you are automatically a Spark Scout! Spark Scouts can choose their own adventure at their own pace to earn awesome badges, swag and adventures by stopping by the Spark Scouts Quest Station.
Spark Scout quest stations are located at Camp Side Quest and Kidsville. Choose a quest that will take you on an adventure around the Lake. Kids will learn about the 10 principles that make our community special while earning cool badges and making new friends.
Be on the lookout for the Special Daily Spark Scouts Quests on the board to earn a special badge!

events.title: Paw Paw Wine Tasting
events.event_description: Join Etch A Sketch to sample her homemade paw paw wine and learn about the native trees that make this special treat possible.

events.title: Goth/Industrial Dance Night
events.event_description: Twirl your tail and stomp your paws to the best goth-industrial mew-sic on the lake! Whether you like old classics or new favorites, hard beats or ethereal melodies, we'll have something for everykitty! Don your cat ears, apply your eyeliner,  and don't be late!

events.title: The Swing's Rococo Tea Party
events.event_description: The smell of gardenia and sweat dances across a ruddy collarbone. Smashed grass under sateen booties. Spilled Champagne, sweet and sticky on sun-kissed skin. Supple velveteen petals dripping with the dew of the morning twilight. The anticipation of what is to come, and the ennui of what could have been.

events.title: Big Screen Wrestling
events.event_description:
The best two places to watch wresting: 
1.) the Hammerstein Ballroom 2.) in your basement! 
Join us for AEW's weekly shows and selected matches from GCW and Demand Lucha (the ones with door gimmicks, of course).

events.title: Lakes of Fire Pronoun Project
events.event_description: Lakes of Fire is dedicated taking a more inclusive stance by acknowledging gender diversity at our event. By allowing individuals to represent themselves with their preferred pronouns, we can establish authentic and personal connections right from the start. Stop by the Greeter's Station anytime while the gate is open and pick up a pronoun button. You will be able to write your preferred pronouns on the button and wear it throughout the event. We encourage all gender identities to participant in order to provide an all inclusive environment for everyone.

events.title: SUP for Lending
events.event_description: Come by and borrow our paddleboards! We can instruct you if we have time. Please know how to swim and use at your own risk.

events.title: Little Free Chaos Library
events.event_description: Come by and grab a book, leave a book, or just take a break at the bookshelf seating space! (warning: other tchothkes and trinkets might find themselves welcome there too)

events.title: Rockstar Bachata Lesson
events.event_description: Strut your way over to MEOW*TOWN and become a Bachata phenom-nom-nom! Learn the basic steps, some partner work, and learn to feline in love with this paw-sitively meow-velous Latin dance style! Beginners welcome!

events.title: Hi Camp "Bi" Camp Storytime with the Chaos Librarian
events.event_description: LET'S READ QUEER BOOKS YA'LL. Dress in your rainbows finest and enjoy listening to lgbtqia+ stories. One picture book and one short story to satisfy all the ages.

events.title: Hot Dog Glory Hole
events.event_description: It's late, but not too late, and you need fuel for the long and exciting journey ahead... join Crappy Bar for crappy hot dogs! We have the meat, the buns, and the hole... all we need is you! With all your favorite condiments, plus condoms and mints, while supplies last! Receive it orally or by hand, we won't yuck your yum! (Vegan dogs available)

events.title: The Aristocats' Tea Purrty
events.event_description: Join us for an elegant afternoon where feline charm meets vintage sophistication. Guests will enjoy a curated selection of artisanal teas, delicate pastries, and whimsical cat-themed treats. Whether you're a dashing tom or a regal tabby, prepare for an afternoon steeped in charm, mischief, and whiskered delight. Bakers are encouraged to bring treats to share!

events.title: "High" Camp Bye Camp 4:20 Storytime with the Chaos Librarian
events.event_description: Bring your highest self for a 4:20pm Storytime and get transported into worlds on the page - this is BYO!

events.title: Mystical Orange Kitty's Roving Tarot
events.event_description: Mystical Kitty will tell your fortune with your choice of tarot decks. Look for the kitty in safety orange robe with reflector strips walking around the lake. Meow!

events.title: Roaming Basement Fiasco Bar Cart
events.event_description: Shortly after we finish nourishing you with our delicious vegan family dinner, our bar cart will head out to serve up libations around the Lake.  We'll have several alcoholic beverages on offer plus some flavored water.  When you see us roll on by, bring a cup or other receptacle to hold liquids and someone will service you as quickly as possible.  Bar cart will end the night back in the basement for some wrestling on our big screen!

events.title: Arcade Gaming
events.event_description: All day and all night Rat City will have arcade machines; so get ready to game your little rat heart out.

events.title: San Escobar's Not So Feral Cat Brunch at The Swing
events.event_description: Join us for a brunch that’s equal parts velvet and claws - a decadent gathering for the delightfully unhinged and fabulously feral. Transform into a feral cat or help out by adopting one looking for that forever home. Serving Bloody Meowies and Dirty Feta Meowtinis (NA options available). Nibble on feral bagels & faux lox or some kibble treats. Cats welcome, humans tolerated.

events.title: Emo Karaoke
events.event_description: A celebration of all things alternative, emo karaoke will be a night of belting all of your favorite emo and pop-punk classics or deep-cuts. Come sing along with us at Sad Kids Club!

events.title: Bar Cart in the Basement
events.event_description: Missing your basement?  Feeling like your night is low on fiasco?  Come on over to Basement Fiasco to enjoy some libations.  Our bar cart will remain stationary tonight, so find us in the basement.  We'll be slinging cocktails and flavored water to accompany the shows on our big screen!

events.title: Fueled by Ramen
events.event_description: Have you had A Day To Remember? Could we pull you out of your All Time Low? Meet Me at the Altar of a hot bowl of DIY ramen. Soft Launch a great night. All Vegan + GF option.

events.title: Rat City Re-Rack
events.event_description: Rat City emerges with a clothing and costume closet! Scrape up something new-to-you that'll bring out the Rat inside. Open 24/7 until burn night, because the Rats in this City never sleep!

events.title: Not My 1st Hobby Horse Rodeo
events.event_description: Dust off your boots and cinch up tight; this IS your first Synner rodeo, and the only thing betwen you and the glory of Alan Jackson in assless chaps is a stick jammed firmly between your legs. Riders will face off in a series of showdowns that are timed, judged, penalized, glorified. Will you take home the trophy or crawl home dragging your saddle?

events.title: Safety Kitty's Cat Themed House Music Set
events.event_description: Put your cat ears on and dance to Safety Kitty's first ever DJ set! All songs will be stupid and cat themed. No fighting, kitties!

events.title: Punk Rock Power Hour
events.event_description: Are you crying? Good. Cry. You'll piss less. Watch Sad Kids Club transform to Mad Kids Club. Listen to some punks both old and new while we all drink on the minute to quell our inner rage. Throw your middles fingers up and send out a "Fuck you" to the universe with us. Let's be real, the universe has earned it.

events.title: Sad Kid Cyber Saloon
events.event_description: Sup, chooms? Motor City's really got the stuff to bring your spirits down. Come see us at Sad Kids Cyber Saloon and see how preem' our spirits are. Chrome the fuck up, and jack the fuck in, because while the Motor City sleeps, we run the streets.

events.title: Backyard BBQ
events.event_description: Come join us for brats and games at OY My back 40. Dad jokes and puns are expressly encouraged along with your nostalgic time in memoria backyard BBQ antics. Come play on the lawn before the neighbors run us off.

events.title: KY Derby
events.event_description: Come one, come ALL to the KY Derby! Enter your own vibrating contestant or be a fabulous spectator in your Derby best, hats and fascinators encouraged. Watch the vibrators race down the track toward their soft, pillowy goal and cheer for your favorite "horse."

events.title: Fairy Portal Closing Meditation
events.event_description: If you're still lost in time after all these days and overstuffed with faery food with no idea how to get back, leave it to the green fae. Come by the cosmic caterpillar cocoon for a guided meditation in preparation for your return to the human world of clocks.

events.title: Movie in the Basement
events.event_description: We're starting with a classic time travel movie tonight - Back to the Future!  Come chill and enjoy this quintessential time travel movie as you look to find your next doorway into the past.  We might even make popcorn if we feel like it.

events.title: Some Awkward Nerd Randomly Rambling About Feline History
events.event_description: Exactly what it says on the tin! Ask me about medieval Celtic cat law, the pet cats of mid-century Antarctica, or the poor baby named Kiddo who found himself on an airship in 1910 and became possibly the first cat ever to fly (and then freaked out).

events.title: Seed Shrine
events.event_description: We green faeries are the keepers of the Seed Shrine. But the seeds themselves are not meant to be kept! They are meant to be shared and spread! Enter the shrine and consult our vast library of seeds. Take a seed, or leave a seed, or just bask in the green glow of sacred biodiversity and faery hijinks.

events.title: Spark Scouts- Frozen Kraken Creamery (GIFTING)
events.event_description: Frozen Kraken Creamery is inviting Spark Scouts and Kids to help them with GIFTING ice cream sandwiches to the community! Sparks will be able to take turns being helpful in the assembly of the Cookies and Ice Cream! Gifting is a special principle at Lakes and a part of the gifting principle is that you give just to give and we shouldn't expect anything in return! But in this case Sparks can also get an ice cream sandwich for helping!

events.title: Miniature Doorways Through Time
events.event_description: Come explore time and space with this interactive art exhibit. Which tiny door will you open next?

events.title: Green Fairy Tale Storytime
events.event_description: Curl up in the the cosmic caterpillar cocoon for storytime and naps!

events.title: Summer Camp Lawn Games
events.event_description: Join our summer shenanigans out front of (Not) Not a Camp Camp -- giant Connect 4, giant Scrabble, cornhole and more.

events.title: Goth Takeover
events.event_description: Come help us clear the cobwebs from our dancefloor! Goth, industrial, EBM, darkwave, and more. Don't let our giant spider eat you 'cause there's no cure for that. J/K yes there is, and we have it.

events.title: Pizza!
events.event_description: Chef-inspired pizza!

events.title: Coffee and crochet
events.event_description: Join us Friday and Saturday 9 am for coffee and crochet at syncytium. Bring a mug and meet under the cozy crochet dome and explore your talents in fiber arts! All skill levels welcome! Meet at the Crochet Dome

events.title: Fairy Portal Opening Meditation
events.event_description: Feeling overwhelmed by all the time portal possiblities? Sounds like the perfect time to step out of time and into the fae realm! Step across the toadstool threshold, enter the cocoon of the cosmic caterpillar, and lay your troubled burner head down in the mossy fae fluff for a guided meditation into faeryland.

events.title: BEEach Party!!!
events.event_description: Birds and Bees (Oh My!), Bugs and trees collab on the fly. Lakeside music & water play; Games, snacks, good vibes all day. Bring a cup, bring a smile, cuz we're going the extra mile! Use the path between #30 & #31. The beach awaits, come join the fun!

events.title: Pancake Shack
events.event_description: It's really more of a "table by the roadside" than a "shack" but if you like homemade buttermilk pancakes and real maple syrup, we'll be serving them up near the Seed Shrine!

events.title: Bardic Inspiration - The Variety Show
events.event_description: AHEM! ROLL FOR PERFORMANCE CHECK. Come be inspired at Camp Side Quest with a little song, a little dance, and - yes - it's optional to wear your pants.

events.title: Upside Down Tea Party
events.event_description:
Lux Ephemera Plays Host to a camp takeover by the Sluts Next D'Whore at Low Noon (that's midnight) on Friday for a miraculous, upside-down Tea Party!  
Fancy Tea! Dancing! Flow Arts! and Miraculous Snackulous: {Miracle Berry Flavor Enhancers and lots of tasty treats to try (Served on a Human Table!)}!

events.title: Dance Hell
events.event_description: There's no wrong way to dance to deliberately un-danceable music! Build pantomime acting skills through spontaneous interpretive dance. Each track is an excellent example of its genre, but we don't know yet how to dance to it. Accompanied by a curated selection of strange silent films. Descend into the underworld of music, expressing humor, sadness, aggression,  game shows, loneliness, awkwardness, and transcendent joy. Credit to Aella for inventing the concept.

events.title: Top Snark Search
events.event_description: We here at Inflatable Camp just want to pop your bubble, or maybe blow it up even more....Are you the Snarkiest, Snarker of them all? Come, Snark it out and let us judge you in the best/worst way possible at Inflatable Camp!

events.title: Cordial Happy Hour
events.event_description: Indulge in an evening of delightful libations and camaraderie at our Cordial Happy Hour! Join us as we infuse polite society with the delights of nature in a burn welcome celebration that promises a refreshing journey through our garden of delight. The Plantiffs of Cordial Plant Camp will be showcasing our signature, homemade cordials with spirits to craft an array of signature cocktails & mocktails. The cordials, made with love, will enchant with flavors of fresh botanicals, herbs, and fruits you're sure to enjoy! Join us!

events.title: Shadow Theater
events.event_description: The Freq Shadow Theater is a participatory installation. It's like an open mic night but with your shadow selves on display. From Dusk till... Generators off... Solo or with a Crew, pop in and let your shadows dance and play! With props and projections on hand impromptu skits, burlesque and hilarity will ensue... the only limits are what your shadows won't do!

events.title: Yoga Flow
events.event_description: Jenna has over a decade of experience as a yoga therapist and somatic practitioner. Whether you need to (re)center and come back home to the body, or you just need to stretch it out from last night’s dance session, this flow is for you! With an emphasis on accessibility, this group is open to ANYONE who wants to join and will blend energizing and grounding practices so you'll be ready to get back out there and enjoy your burn with more presence, calm, and clarity. *BYOM *Requests welcome! See you at Lamp Camp!

events.title: Movie in the Basement
events.event_description: Feeling like you've seen some fiascos today?  Come on over to visit Basement Fiasco and add Frank the Bunny to that list!  We're bringing you Donnie Darko tonight to explore the darker side of time travel.  We might even make popcorn if we feel like it.

events.title: Hippo Hydration Station
events.event_description: Stop by the self serve Hippo Hydration Station at HippoCampUs to fill up your cup with water and a hydration packet. Hangout and interpret chest prints while you hydrate. Look out for the occasional pop up Hippo Dehydration Station takeover!

events.title: The High Bar
events.event_description: Come enjoy delicious craft gin and n/a cocktails. Drinks are served up - up high! - at this speakeasy spectacle.

events.title: Tramp Stamp Camp - A Doorway to the 90s
events.event_description: When life was simpler. You can learn about "tramp stamps" and help rewrite the script on these sexy, badass tattoos. Go home with one on YOUR hot bod (temporarily, at least). Or not - your body, your choice. Remember the good ol’ days by cuddling a furby, nibbling some 90s snacks, playing nostalgic games, or just chilling on an inflatable chair. Commemorate your time in the 90s with a photo to cherish forever.

events.title: Freaky Tiki
events.event_description:
Ecstatic expressions - 

Don't look away

events.title: Toga! Toga! Togally 80’s!
events.event_description: Break out your banana clip, big hair and toga up for a Togally 80’s party at Boogie Woogie Cabaret! We’ll be dancing in our sheets to the best 80’s bops.

events.title: "Cordial" Tea Party
events.event_description:
Join Cordial "Plant" Camp for our first ever "Cordial" Tea Party, a charmingly refined and exclusive gathering with real tea, dainty snacks, and a collection of respectable, upstanding individuals.*
*This is a polite event. Failure to comply with the rules, no matter how arbitrary, will result in your swift and courteous expulsion. You may return once you’ve minded your manners.

events.title: Portal Opening
events.event_description: Our portal is activated, our lights shine. we welcome you to come inside.   Nightly music with special guests and bar service  (Zero Proof Soda Bar! {with optional alcohol}) until 2am or later.  Swing by and read the sign during the day to see what we have planned!

events.title: Double Feature in the Basement
events.event_description: Tonight we've got a double feature for y'all along with our bar cart!  Hot Tub Time Machine followed by History of the World Part I.  Relax and enjoy the ridiculousness in our comfy basement.

events.title: 💋 Say What You Mean (Without Being Mean)
events.event_description: Nonviolent Communication 101 - because life’s too short for passive-aggression. Come hang with the sexy librarian 👓💋 and learn how to turn conflict into connection, say what you really need, and hear what’s actually behind that snarky tone. Feelings welcome 🥹💖.

events.title: Pillow Princess Palace
events.event_description: Lounge in our lovely GAYbeds for impromptu cuddles, meaningful conversations, and delightfully random social engagements. Perhaps your Lakes of Fire meet-cute could occur at the Pillow Princess Palace!

events.title: Chunky Dunk
events.event_description: Join fellow fat burners for our clothing-optional beach and swim time in our safe and affirming environment. Bring a snack, a friend, or just yourself, meet new fat friends, and float in feelings of bliss.

events.title: Brick D*ck Interactive Art
events.event_description:
Wanna draw some eggplants? Come add a d*ck-brick to Ypsilanti Michigan's world
famous Brick D*ck water tower! Come draw on our water tower! It's smaller than the
original but big enough to satisfy the masses!

events.title: Kraken Floats
events.event_description: Stop by the Frozen Kraken Creamery and indulge in an evening root beer float! We will be serving floats - with or without rum, as desired - as long as supplies last. Bring your own liquid and we'll happily float some cream for you.

events.title: Bassline Bonfire
events.event_description:
When the sun goes down and the uncertainty sets in, join us at Bassline Bonfire for nightly fire-fueled audio alchemy. Watch Elemental Waves, our hand-crafted inferno machine (aka. Rubens tube), turn sound into flame in a display of dancing fire and optical delight. We’ll be running the show after dark 'til the propane runs out, the music stops, or someone finally answers one of life’s big questions (like, what time is it?).
Located in the existential haze of Not Sure Village, we’re equal parts fire safety and mesmerizing spectacle. Come stare into the flames with us-we’re not sure what you’ll see, but it’ll definitely be lit.

events.title: Boogie Woogie FIGURE DRAWING
events.event_description: Come Join Thor for Boogie Woogie Figure Drawing Lounge, the original Lakes of Fire nude figure drawing experience, as always backed up with live music! Art supplies provided or bring your own.

events.title: Mending and Alterations 101
events.event_description: This workshop will go over the basics of learning to mend and alter clothes to better suit your wardrobe needs. Have a garment that needs repair? Bring it with you and we can tackle it together! Class materials provided

events.title: Spanks & Dranks
events.event_description:
Spanks & Dranks returns for an eighth year!  

Spanks & Dranks is an adults only, celebration of paddling and libations.  It is not meant to be taken seriously and you DO NOT HAVE TO GET A SPANKING TO GET TO DRANKING!  Unlike in past years, this is a one day event so don't miss it!  Drinks, giveaways, games and fun!  NO ONE UNDER 21!

events.title: Kidsville Shenanigans
events.event_description: Stop in and make some new friends. Have some lemonade or play red light green light on the road. Enjoy the games and crafts of the day in the front yard.

events.title: Trans Swim
events.event_description: Join fellow transgender and nonbinary burners for our clothing-optional beach and swim time in our safe and affirming environment. Bring a snack, a friend, or just yourself, meet new trans friends, and float in feelings of bliss.

events.title: Frozen Kraken Travelling Ice Cream
events.event_description: Our ice cream cart is traveling through space and time to bring you a timeless treat. Listen for the bells and barkers as we circle the lake and bring you fresh, frozen ice cream.

events.title: Wheelchair Charging Station
