events.event_description: Is your wheelchair or motorized mobility scooter in need of a charge? Hang out with our friendly Y'allvillians when you stop by our wheelchair charging station for a power UP!

events.title: Guided Meditation to prepare for Effigy Burn
events.event_description: Join us for a guided meditation as we prepare for the Effigy Burn by releasing any tension and/or blocked energy.  All meditation experience levels welcome! Starting with simple progressive muscle relaxation we then move into guided visualization.  Meet at Y'allville beach, final location TBD.

events.title: Crip Dip
events.event_description: Join fellow disabled burners for our clothing-optional beach and swim time in our safe and affirming environment. Bring a snack, a friend, or just yourself, meet new disabled friends, and float in feelings of bliss.

events.title: 24/7 Foot Fetish Daily
events.event_description: Foot Lovers! Stop by and rub our feet.  Ask for ‘tastic or the Mayor.  Any time, any day.

events.title: Stitch n Bitch
events.event_description: Are you angry at the government? Would you like to radically express that anger while stabbing something? Come to Stitch n Bitch and commiserate with us! Needles, thread, patches and punk music will be provided all you need is to bring something to attach your creation to and something to bitch about. All fiber arts/crafts welcome!

events.title: Calypso Cafe
events.event_description: Drop by Boogie Woogie and dance to Caribbean soca and calypso music with us while sipping on our Calypso Cooler.  What better way to prime yourself for a big night than to start with island vibes and a drink?

events.title: Museum of Pizza
events.event_description: Special exhibit - "Pizza through time"

events.title: Hedwig's Angry Singalong
events.event_description: Are enemies and adversaries trying to tear YOU down? Well, follow my voice through the dark turns and noise to Boogie Woogie Cabaret! Put on some makeup, some LaVern Baker, and belt out your favorite songs from Hedwig and the Angry Inch. BYO Wig

events.title: Wire Art Workshop
events.event_description:
Get prehistoric with Bluejae and learn to make a simple wire wrapped pendant featuring an orthoceras/squid fossilized in stone. This project takes approximately 1.5-2 hrs and is for adults only. Bring reading glasses if you use them - 8 seats available.
BONUS: If this project doesn’t suit you, don’t worry, there’s also a quick and simple suncatcher or keychain project available that’s suitable for everyone! Stop by and create your own one of a kind work of art! While supplies last!

events.title: Paint & Take Miniature Painting
events.event_description: Paint a magical miniature and take it home with you to fight dragons or look cool on your shelf. We’ll provide minis and supplies or bring your own.

events.title: Kink Tastings
events.event_description: Curious for a curated sensory experience? Interested in impact play? Looking for light bondage? Seeking a solid spank to start your Thursday off with a bang? Swing by Pleasure House for an offering of small samples of kinky delights on the spanking bench or cross. Participation is grounded in informed, enthusiastic consent, with a commitment to risk-awareness and personal responsibility.

events.title: HEALING HUT
events.event_description: The Healing Hut has returned to Syncytium again.  Stop by for various forms of healing.  Massage, Reiki, Adjustments and Meditation Classes just to mention a few.

events.title: ✨🥞 FLIP OUT with Pockets & Disco Kitty’s Gluten-Free Pancake Extravaganza! 🥞✨ (Vegan options? You bet your non-dairy butter we’ve got ‘em.)
events.event_description:
Straight from the high-altitude breakfast labs of Colorado, Pockets and Disco Kitty will lovingly whisk, flip, and dramatically plate-spun by our fuzzy breakfast duo, these gluten-free beauties are so tasty, even wheat is jealous. 

Whether you're vegan, gluten-free, or just in it for the syrupy ride, this stack of joy is here to elevate your morning to pure brunch enlightenment.

Shout out to our lovely hosts at Aunt Marsha’s Bed and Breakfast for hosting us during this event!

events.title: Omelet-in-a-Bag Breakfast
events.event_description: A hot breakfast to start your day (or finish your night).  Write your name on a freezer bag, add eggs and your favorite fixins, and visit with your fellow burners while it boils into yummy burrito-ready goodness.  Tortillas and hot sauce provided.  Some vegetarian options available.  9-ish until the eggs are gone (about 50 a day).  Look for the red and white scuba diver flag in the back of the East End.

events.title: Leave a Trace Art Wall
events.event_description: (Not) Not a Camp Camp has a giant canvas art wall and we want you to Leave a Trace using our art supplies or your own - as long as you don't damage the canvas, you're welcome to do as you'd like (though we encourage you to use up empty space first). While you're there, please feel free to take an art piece from our Art Gifting Wall!

events.title: Hairy Marys
events.event_description: Nothing says "Good Morning" like bloody marys and mustaches!

events.title: Pajama Party
events.event_description: Throw on your favorite jammies, slip on your jellies, and bring your caboodle over to Deep Struggle, Bitch! Village for a pajama party! Featuring pancakes, breakfast-themed beverages, throwback hits, and, of course, Girl Talk.

events.title: Tiny Art Making and Drop-in Crafting
events.event_description: Make art, gift art! Join us in our (shaded) art space to create a masterpiece on recycled material for the revolving art show that is the Art is for Everybody Art Gifting Wall. Or, bring your own craft and make things in community!

events.title: The Ones Who Walk With Us
events.event_description: A night dedicated to honoring queer POC ancestors (famous or personal) on the most spiritual evening of the event; Burn night. Come to Camp Yallville (The Love Network) and give your offerings. One card Tarot/Oracle readings will also be offered.

events.title: They Knot like us
events.event_description: Hey you! Yeahhh you... Have you ever been curious about Shibari for fashion? Come on down to Boogie Woogie Cabaret and allow us to teach a couple simple rope pieces for you. We try knot to do too many rope puns, but bring a friend to learn if they aren't in a bind.

events.title: Unicorn Ring Toss
events.event_description: Sunset is best accompanied by the game as old as time, unicorn ring toss. Enjoy our cocktail pairing to assist honing your skill in a delightful game of looping phallus

events.title: Fire Spin Circle Flow Jam
events.event_description: Come spin fire together! Jam out, enjoy the background fire art casting forms of shadow and light on your elemental performance. Main timing of spin gathering starts at 10 PM each night, but spinners are welcome to flow any time in our designated safety circle so long as you follow standard safety rules. All levels welcome and supported!

events.title: Boogie Woogie Open BODY PAINTING
events.event_description:
Come to Boogie Woogie Cabaret to get body painted! Paint your naked friends, paint your naked enemies, get painted yourself. This event is lightly supervised, and a selection of paints will be available for all comers, or bring your own setup and use our shady yurt to paint people. Do what you want. I'm not your mom. 
Stick around to pose for drawing after!

events.title: Did someone say (janky) cookies and ice cream?
events.event_description: Our friends at Baked on the Lake are taking the year off to recuperate, but the Krakens are keeping alive our ice cream sandwich collab tradition! Join us for janky ice cream sammies featuring the fresh grilled store bought cookies.

events.title: Blazing Libations!
events.event_description: Pop by Blazing Libations for some fresh French pressed coffee, tea, chai, and hot chocolate while listening to some rad tunes from the '80s!

events.title: Lakes of Fire Bingo
events.event_description:
Lakes of Fire Bingo, easy concept, easy way to keep a record of all the wildest and weirdest events you've witnessed and/or participated in this wonderful week.

We will have Bingo sheets ready for the taking. You simply need to mark off the events as you experience them and return to show off evidence of your action-packed burn!

events.title: Blazing Libations!
events.event_description: Stop by Blazing Libations for some fresh French pressed coffee, tea, chai, and hot chocolate while listening to some fly tunes from the '90s!

events.title: Lakes of Fire Video Game Kids Tournament
events.event_description: HEY KIDS!!!!! Come try your hand at the EXCLUSIVE Lakes of Fire video game and play Lakes of Fire: A Retro Adventure of Dubious Realism! Take an hour and play against your kids to see who might be the best on the lake! This event can be entered by just the kids.

events.title: Eat like the Eighties
events.event_description: Remember those delicious 80s foods? Too young to remember? Come join the team at Lucas' Lair for some delectable 1980s mealtime classics!

events.title: Syncytium Friends & Family night
events.event_description:
Friends and family night intersecting with our goth industrial beats!
Whether you’re a longtime friend, someone we’ve lovingly corrupted, or just intrigued by the glow of our dark little corner, come by and say hi.

events.title: Luv Bug Shots
events.event_description: Cheeky shots with a side of photography. Start with a drink- fruity, fiery or flirty - then hop in the booth in your full glam glory! Strike a pose, be silly, say cheesey-balls, tben get your printed Luv Bug shots!l to go!

events.title: “20-Bucks” Wee Effigy Tribute
events.event_description: Celebrate the Spirit of "20-Bucks" - Join us in honoring 20-Bucks (Ian Epstein) with a heartfelt tribute, Burner-style. We’ll gather for a remembrance ceremony at 8pm on the wee effigy beach to celebrate the Ian we knew and loved, and then burn a tribute wee effigy around 9-930pm. Come share in the love, laughter, memories and legacy of our unforgettable friend.  *** Swing by Disco Bees (#32) or Crappy Bar (#79) BEFORE FRIDAY EVE to write a memory or message on a limited edition 20-Bucks Note, then place it in a money vault that will be burned with the wee effigy.

events.title: Open Decks
events.event_description: Got a set you’ve been dying to play? Cosmic Disco is handing over the decks. We’re opening up our sound system to guest DJs of all stripes-whether you’re a seasoned spinner or just want to share your favorite weird little mix. Bring your USB or your vinyl, hop in the dome, and take a slot. No gatekeeping, no egos, just good tunes and good vibes.

events.title: Blazing Libations!
events.event_description: Hustle on over to Blazing Libations for some fresh French pressed coffee, tea, chai, and hot chocolate while listening to some far-out tunes from the '70s!

events.title: Blazing Libations!
events.event_description: Swing by Blazing Libations for some fresh French pressed coffee, tea, chai, and hot chocolate while listening to some groovy tunes from the '60s!

events.title: Aerial Jam
events.event_description: I'll put up some silks and can teach people beginner climbs & foot knots if you wanna learn. Experienced folks are welcome to just come get some air time in or bring their own apparatus & I'll help you rig it for some flow time.

events.title: Sexy Space Rager From Space!  FROM SPACE!!!!!
events.event_description: Drinks, Dancing, Music, Beautiful Humans, and the SEXY SPACE RAIDERS FROM SPACE! ...FROM SPACE!!!!! Come toss some Alien Dong Darts, get a few songs in dancing on the pole at the Striptarium, and bring us your completed Lakes of Fire Bingo sheet.

events.title: Spark Scouts - GREETERS Quest (Civic Responsibility)
events.event_description:
Greeters is inviting all Spark Scouts Kids to join in on the CIVIC RESPONSIBILITY of burning! Sparks and Kids just need to bring a non-perishable food item to the Greeters Station to donate to the FOOD DRIVE! At Lakes of Fire we all donate food for the Local Food Bank. It helps people who don't have enough food resources be able to feed their families. 
Sparks can ask for a Greeters Sticker/Swag after they make their food donations.
If your REALLY inspired by Civic Responsibility gather your sparks and organize a quest around the Lake asking camps for donations and bring a BIG load of food for a donation!

events.title: Spark Scouts- DPW Quest (Communal Effort)
events.event_description:
Learn all about COMMUNAL EFFORT:
All Burner Kids are invited to Join Sparks Scouts on an EPIC Quest!
Come on down to DPW and learn all about how LOF is keeping running smooth. From set-up to tear-down and all the repairs in between. DPW is the department that keeps everything up and running. It's all about COMMUNAL EFFORT at the DPW! Spark Scouts won't want to miss this event hosted by The DPW! Sparks and Kids will earn an awesome Badge for participation!

events.title: Opening Pharoh's Amphorae
events.event_description: Come sample wine and liqueur distilled from delicious dates. Get a taste as refreshing as a desert oasis made from recipes older than the pyramids.

events.title: Spark Scouts- RADIO'S Quest (Participation)
events.event_description:
RADIOS is inviting all Spark Scouts to stop by Radio HQ to learn about the PARTICIPATION principle!
Spark Scouts will learn how Departments communicate with one another to keep our Burn running smooth. 
Kids will be given the opportunity to do a REAL live Radio Check to volunteers to make sure their radios are in tip top shape!
Spark Scouts and Kids will earn a special Radios Badge for this Quest!

events.title: Hip-hop Kara-oke with Spirit Squirrel
events.event_description: Come get your rock star fix and our high asses will encourage you. We'll go until we feel like it(Probably 2 hoursish)

events.title: Spark Scouts- LNT Quest (Leave No Trace)

LNT is inviting all Spark Scouts and kids to stop by the LNT tent and grab a moop bag and start picking up MOOP!
Moop is Material out of Place. A huge principle of burning is to always leave a place better than it was found. We all work together to keep our event clean. That means we pick up after ourselves and others who may have forgotten.
After you fill your MOOP bag throughout the entire time your at the Lake stop back by LNT and pick up a sticker or swag they may have!
Make sure to thank the Volunteers working on a MOOP Loop shift when you see them!

Radical Self Expression is what makes Lakes of Fire special. Everyone is an artist at the Art Hub. When you are done making your art keep it for yourself or gift it to someone special! You can even hang it on the KIDS ART ARCH located in Kidsville to showcase!

Do you have your own first aid kit?
Ask one of the ESD volunteers what skills they have to learn how YOU can be radically self reliant.
Sparks and Kids will earn a special gift to help them be more Radically Self Reliant!

We will worship this magic, glowing tree and cast our spells around it with our fluttering wings. We will sing songs about the ecstasy of illumination: karaoke style! events.title: Slumber Party Horror: My Little Pink Pony Edition
events.event_description:
Slip into your sassiest sleepwear and gallop over to the My Little Pink Pony Palace for an ‘80s slasher sleepover soaked in pastel panic and pillow talk. We’re screening cult horror classics in a sea of pillows, blankets, and enough fringe to summon the ghost of Heather Chandler.

Think Lisa Frank meets Final Girl energy with plenty of screams, snuggles, and synthetic fabrics. Come for the camp, stay for the carnage.

Because nothing says slumber party like a little bloodshed in a pink dream palace.

events.title: Sound Healing Journey at Cat Camp

events.title: Intergalactic Hoedown
events.event_description: So kickin' space cowboy tunes, or just tunes, or who knows what. They'll be music and dancing and hanging in the lounge.

events.title: Midnight Munchies: PB&J After Dark
events.event_description:
When the lake gets dark and your inner latchkey kid starts to stir, wander over to The Atoms Family camp for a late-night snack straight out of your childhood TV dinner fantasies: grilled peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, hot off the griddle and oozing with nostalgia.

It’s like an after-school treat got lost in time, crash-landed in the lake, and decided to serve looks and lunch.

Come in your PJs, your power suit, or that weird thing you’ve been wearing for three days. No judgment just jelly, good vibes, and the warm hug of a sandwich that tastes like 1987.

Because after dark, we're all just kids looking for snacks and a little chaos.

events.title: SAN ESCOBAR - El Niño Air Shuttle Service
events.event_description: El Niño Air Flight 420 Shuttle Service. Official LOF Walking Rest Stop. San Escobar Viva Welcome Center. Rio Gato Ally Kat Meeting Circle. 24/7 pSelf Check-In Site…Loitering and Tinkering strongly encouraged. YOU are WELCOME!

events.title: Total Eclipse of the Camp: '80s Karaoke Night
events.event_description:
Grab the mic, slap on some shimmer, and prepare to wail your way through the greatest decade that ever teased its hair. It’s ‘80s Karaoke Night at The Atoms Family, and we’re turning the volum and the drama all the way up.

Come dressed as your power ballad alter ego: shoulder pads, spandex, fingerless gloves yes, all at once. Channel your inner Madonna, your outer Bowie, or the synth-pop star you were born to be.

Because at The Atoms Family, we don’t just sing the hits: we live them. One over-the-top note at a time.

events.title: Sloppy & Sassy at The Atoms Family
events.event_description:
Grab your tray, fix your hairnet, and report to the cafeteria because The Atoms Family is serving up school lunch nostalgia with a side of sass.

We’re dishing out that old-school cafeteria classic: vegetarian sloppy joes, hot, messy, and made with love (and possibly a little gossip from the teacher’s lounge). No mystery meat here just sloppy, satisfying goodness straight from the ladle of our finest lunchroom divas.

Bring your plate, bring your hunger, and maybe bring your emotional support juice box. Get sloppy with us. We won’t judge. Much.

A dusty, delicious vault of books, zines, and raw emotional intel. Browse, borrow, or keep-no due dates, no rules, just radical curiosity. An eclectic collection, which could include weird science to soft smut, social theory to space wizards; You’ll find something to light you up! 

Occasionally staffed by the sexy librarian (glasses on, vibes high). And while you’re here…

📘 Sign our YEARBOOK. Leave a love note, a memory, a drawing, or your camp crush’s burner name.

Just look for the milk crates and the faint scent of existential arousal.

Let's find out! Join us for a guided backward stroll around Lucky Lake. Say goodbye to folks as you go!

events.event_description:

Come leap into the world of Polka dancing-a claw-some, slightly chaotic whirlwind that will leave you feline fantastic. I grew up doing Polka at family weddings and gatherings, and now I’m excited to teach you the basics of this whirlwind of movement. Traditionally, it takes two to tango-er, Polka-but don’t worry if you come solo. We’ll help match up partnerless folks, and maybe a curious clowder of three will paw-sitively reinvent Polka with an extra dancer in the mix.

Illuminations: 

Illuminations are another Peruvian Shamanism Technique that remove the Imprints (heavy energy) from LEF (Luminous Energy Field) and Chakras. Chakras get balanced and the imprint gets removed.

Illuminations bring us back into balance by burning up the sludge & deposits in the wall of the chakras. Combusting the toxic energy around malignant physical & Emotional imprints. Scours clean the imprints in the LEF. Transforms heavy emotions associated with trauma & disease into nourishing life energy.

events.title: Interpreting Rorchest Prints — Every Mark Tells a Story
events.event_description:
These chest prints, inspired by the fluid shapes of Rorschach inkblots, are more than just paint on canvas-they are bold expressions of identity, transformation, and self-love. Each print reflects the unique curves, scars, strengths, and stories carried in the bodies that made them.

As you view these pieces, we invite you to interpret them with wonder and compassion. What do you see? A butterfly, a flame, wings in flight? There are no wrong answers-only possibilities.

This banner honors the beauty of every body and the courage it takes to be seen. Each print is a celebration, a protest, a joyful declaration: I am here. I am whole. I am art.

events.title: Shamanic Soul Retrieval
events.event_description:
What is a Soul Retrieval? 

Soul Retrieval is a sacred ceremony where we will walk together to reclaim our lost soul fragments, supporting each other to embody our originality and call back our power, allowing ourselves to be truly seen and held in who we are.  Healing your soul and life takes on new meaning.  Connecting on a soul level is part of the miracle of our Earthwalk. 

I learned this while studying Shamanism. Most of us feel something is missing in our lives at one time or another.  Either that, or we simply do not feel we are truly in our lives or body.  In Shamanism, the overwhelming focus, then, turns to soul loss.  When we undergo trauma, major trauma or minor trauma, our soul can split and part of us can leave (dissociation).  We experience this as a loss of energy and power, with all its attending manifestations: anxiety, depression, addiction, feelings of isolation, aloneness, general lack of energy and enthusiasm, and/or the resulting physical manifestations of a variety of autoimmune disorders or disease. 

I’ve found that one soul-retrieval session can accomplish what may take many years to heal employing psychotherapy. This is because the soul-retrieval journey involves renegotiating obsolete soul contracts and discarding limiting beliefs. In addition, the language of the soul is very different from what we use in therapy and counseling. It’s rich in image, myth, archetypes, and mystery; full of poetry and magic, it speaks to intuition and love. 

In indigenous societies, the Shaman is then tasked with journeying into the spirit world (Underworld) to retrieve those lost soul pieces. 

After Shamans perform a soul retrieval, they also teach you how to do this work for yourself.  

You will learn:  
-  How to retrieve those lost soul pieces
-  Once realized and retrieved, how to nurture them and keep them to bring us back fully into our lives
-  How to help make us whole again so that we may move forward in loving harmony

events.title: AS IF!: A 90s Power Hour
events.event_description: Come step back in time (30 years) to an age when you fought over which Spice Girl to be, neglected your Tamagotchis, or collected beanie babies to save for retirement. Join us for a 90s inspired POWER HOUR dance party and get a vintage yearbook photo taken in front of a classic 90s backdrop (ya'll remember).  PBR offered! Wear 90s apparel or just come soak up the nostalgic vibes!

events.title: Beans and (optional) Weenies
events.event_description: Come down to Beantown for a serving of delicious funked up vegetarian baked beans and optional (meat) lil' smokies smothered in sauce.

events.title: Cosmic Karaoke
events.event_description: Ever wanted to scream-sing Celine Dion into the void while bathed in strobe lights and questionable decisions? Now’s your chance. Cosmic Disco invites you to step into the dome and unleash your inner diva, dad rocker, or glitter goblin. We’ve got the mics, the sound, and a sign-up sheet that may or may not be sticky. You bring the YouTube link and unshakable confidence. Bonus points for choreography and emotional backstories.

events.title: 1990’s Throwback Party
events.event_description:
🎉 **You’re Totally Invited!** 🎉
**It’s a 1990s Throwback Party!**

Break out the flannel, fire up the boombox, and dust off those platform sneakers - we’re rewinding to the raddest decade: THE NINETIES! 
👕 **90s Fashion Showdown** - Dress to impress in your dopest '90s outfit. Think grunge, neon, overalls, windbreakers, and butterfly clips. Prizes for the most iconic looks!
🎤 **Totally Talented Talent Show** - Sing, dance, lip-sync, or act out your favorite 90s moments. Bonus points for Spice Girls, Will Smith raps, or boy band choreography!
🧠 **Back-in-the-Day Trivia** - How well do you remember the 90s? Compete in throwback trivia for bragging rights and retro prizes!
🎶 We’ll be spinning the ultimate '90s playlist. 
So grab your scrunchies, slap bracelets, and Tamagotchis - it's gonna be all that and a bag of chips. Be there or be square!

events.title: Back-40: Boozy Breakfast w/ Fresh Coffee, Hot Eats, and Bloody Mary Bar
events.event_description:
Where pickle passion meets breakfast perfection!
The menu:
  1. Sunshine Brew - freshly brewed dark roast coffee
  2. The Brine - boutique Bloody Mary bar with pickled garnishes
  3. Buttery scrambled eggs with melty sharp cheddar
  4. Sizzling Hashbrowns, a golden, greasy masterpiece
  5. Dill-dough Toast - homemade sourdough with dill-infused butter or mango chutney. 

8 AM for drinks, 9 AM for food. Closes at 11 AM. Bring your own plate & fork to earn a bonus treat.

events.title: Shamanic Illuminations
events.event_description:
Illuminations: 

Illuminations are another Peruvian Shamanism Technique that remove the Imprints (heavy energy) from LEF (Luminous Energy Field) and Chakras. Chakras get balanced and the imprint gets removed.

Illuminations bring us back into balance by burning up the sludge & deposits in the wall of the chakras. Combusting the toxic energy around malignant physical & Emotional imprints. Scours clean the imprints in the LEF. Transforms heavy emotions associated with trauma & disease into nourishing life energy.

events.title: Outrageous Orange Outfit Outlet
events.event_description:
Join the OUTRAGEOUS ORANGE OPPOSITION!

Obviously ordinary outfits are obsolete!
Open your options to our overwhelming orange oasis! We're obsessed with orchestrating an ostentatious orange overthrow of this dusty domain.
We have: Obnoxiously bright safety vests, oceanic swimsuits, optimal raincoats, over-the-top sweaters, and oodles of other orange oddities. 

From onesies to oversized 5X options - we outfit everyone!

Come and help organize an overwhelming orange army that's observable from orbit. 

Come to us ordinary. 
Obtain outrageous orange opulence. 
Operate as an unstoppable orange operative

Help us win in our ongoing war against wardrobe mediocrity.

events.title: Friendship Bracelets with That Bitch
events.event_description: Come make friends and friendship bracelets with new burner, That Bitch!!! They are looking for new friends to explore the lake with!

events.title: The Graveyard Shift
events.event_description: Rise from your graves! Stop by the The Graveyard during the witching hours and attend the Graveyard Shift where we will be serving special cocktails and having a ghoulishly good time.

events.title: Saturday Morning Cartoons at the My Little Pink Pony Palace
events.event_description:
It’s Saturday morning, the cereal is imaginary, and the vibes are immaculate.

Throw on your favorite underroos, grab a blanket, and kick it old-school as The Atoms Family beams you straight back to the golden age of neon, nonsense, and non-stop animation. We're talkin’ real Saturday morning cartoons when the colors were bright, the plots made no sense, and your only responsibility was not spilling milk on the shag carpet.

We’ll be screening classics from the '80s the kind that came with toy commercials, questionable moral lessons, and theme songs that still live rent-free in your head.

events.title: San Escobar Beach Party
events.event_description: Marina Huana San Escobar Activities: Inflatable Life. Coozy Cove. Competitive Bird Watching. Daytime Navel Gazing. Loitering and Tinkering strongly encouraged. Shade provided. Spontaneous DIY Margaritas and Pickle Backs. Random Sausage Parties. Mustard. YOU are Welcome!!

events.title: School Picture Day
events.event_description: Were all your school photos taken with a boring "traditional" blue background? Now's your chance to right that wrong and get the rad photo of your laser-filled dreams!

events.title: Lorem Ipsum Tattoo Parlor for temporary tattoos
events.event_description: Stop by the Lorem Ipsum Tattoo Parlor to get unique and vibrant temporary tattoos designed and applied by legendary tattoo artist Kino (@kinotattoos). This is an all ages offering while supplies last.

events.title: DIY Earings
events.event_description: Make new earrings with Bunny and Kel! We'll have trinkets and supplies for creating your new favorite adornments, but feel free to bring anything you think might be useable for making funky jewelry! Available until supplies run out.

events.title: Burn Speed Matching
events.event_description:
Speed dating / match making event!
Looking for a partner or someone to hang out with at Lakes? Just want to make new friends?
Come to a speed dating event at the Pleasure House on Thursday from 11am-12:30pm.
Come out and meet new people!

events.title: Divine through time
events.event_description: The past is a place full of many things and the future has room for the set of eyes that opens the doorway. Have your future read by the basement dwellers via cards, cold reads, palms, runes, or something like that.

events.title: Rope Bomb
events.event_description: Rope Bomb at the Synytium dome! Calling all riggers, rope bunnies, and self tiers! Starting after our Shibari 101 class, we are going to get as many people tied to the big metal dome as possible. Whether suspended or not won't matter! It's going to be one big bomp of rope, energy, and art!

events.title: Non-Monogamy Conversation
events.event_description: Whether you've been living an ethically non-monogamous life for as long as you can remember, or you're unquestioningly monogamous and interested in understanding how the other side lives, join our informal conversation-now a Pleasure House tradition-about life on the spectrum of non-monogamy.

events.title: Burner O'clock Specials
events.event_description: We're open everyday when we're open and closed when we're not. Wet your whistle when the sign's out or the open light's on.

events.title: Beanpod
events.event_description:
Are you hot, tired, and wishing for a quiet space to relax for a few minutes on your journey?  Stop in at the Beanpod at site 87a in Y'allville for a shaded, enclosed respite. Grab a beverage from the Y'allville mocktail bar and sit a spell, have your cards read (when available), and enjoy the cozy vibes. Open all day!

Children must be accompanied by a parent or responsible other.

events.title: Come Glamping with us!
events.event_description: Aunt Marsh'a Bed and Breakfast offers the ultimate glamping experience. Come and stay at our glamping tent and let us feed you breakfast in the morning. Daily raffle will be pulled at 5:00 pm.

events.title: What Will You Grow?
events.event_description: Come over to the Beanpod in Beantown and sit for a short guided meditation on your intentions for this burn. Make and take a caged bean pendant to carry with you around the Lake, absorbing all of the lessons and experiences the burn offers, then take it home to plant it in good soil or cast it into a fallow field (don't moop).

events.title: POC Cookout
events.event_description:
The grills are hot, the beats are hotter, and the community? Absolutely cookin’. Welcome to the 6th Annual POC Cookout - an afternoon of food, laughter, deep connection, and finding out who really knows how to season their potato salad.

We’re serving burgers, dogs, fruit, and chips - you bring a dish that feels like home (or just one that slaps). Got auntie-level mac and cheese? A legendary mango salsa? We want it. Just label it clearly (allergens, dietary details, and whether it contains regret or raisins), watch over it like it’s your last cold LaCroix, and clean up when it’s gone.

Expect DJs from across the Lake keeping the soundtrack just right, beach lounging, spontaneous dance circles, and at least one moment that makes you say, "Damn, I needed this." We’re also gathering for a big, beautiful BIPOC group photo during or after the cookout - come through, camera-ready or not.  Even if your tank top's inside out and your dignity’s still recovering from Thursday night.

This gathering is by and for people of color. Allies are welcome with care, humility, and a clear understanding: this space centers POC joy, rest, and connection. No hair-touching. No weird questions. No exceptions.

Bring sunscreen. Bring snacks. Bring your full, glorious self. We’ll see you at the shore for an afternoon of sunshine, soul, and solidarity.

events.title: Letters to Alyson Letter Writing Station and Collaborative Playlist
events.event_description:
This art piece features a sculpture of Alyson phasing through an antique door, and an interactive letter writing station that invites you to express your own grief through a letter to your dead loved one, which you may choose to either keep or to burn in the effigy or temple to send it to them. Also featured is the interactive playlist, where you can request songs that remind you of them.

Stop by during the day to hear the playlist, add songs, and write your letter. Stop by at night for a quiet place for self reflection/expression, and to see the sculpture glow in her full glory. 

While this art grant is primarily about queer grief, anyone is welcome to participate! If you had a complicated relationship with your person, your letters are welcome too!  You and your grief of any kind are welcome here.

(Saturday; you must get your letter in before 1pm if you want its destination to be the effigy)

events.title: 😻Make Your Own Cat Ears
events.event_description:
Title: Make Your Own Cat Ears! 

Come design your cat ears with headbands & zip ties. Usually takes 5 minutes. Plus we may have some limited custom made on the spot cat collars as well! Transform into your full meowfit. Come be a kitty and test out your new ears in our cat nap n chill spaces.

events.title: Hop on over to Freewill—Bunny Camp’s magical mock-up of Goodwill,
events.event_description:
FREEWILL @ Bunny Camp site 28  

Open Daily • 9 am-5ish (or until the glitz and glam settles)

Looking for your next lakes outfit? Need a last-minute prom dress, a shiny shirt, mesh moment, or just a really questionable pair of pants? 

Maybe some hippie hits and vintage gems or platform shoes that will make you taller than your problems.

Hop on over to Freewill-Bunny Camp’s magical mock-up of Goodwill, where the price tag is always zero and the vibes are always extra.

We’re fully stocked with costume chaos and wardrobe wonders for any and all. 

✨New treasures hit the racks all day long-so come early, come often, and come weird.✨

events.title: The Basement door
events.event_description:
A portal tucked just beneath the ordinary - where the past and future fold into the now. Step into a hidden space where time unravels and reweaves itself through art, memory, and mystery. Leave behind a gift, a relic, or suprisefron the future. Discover a treasure, a whisper from another time, or a piece of someone else's journey.

This time-travel-themed installation invites you to explore a surreal exchange zone pulsing with creative energy.

events.title: Acro Speed Dating
events.event_description:
Do you like stacking bodies on top of other bodies?
We'll be teaching acro-yoga basics and rotating base/flyer matchups. See what it's like to base and fly on different people, learn some acrobatic tricks, and build trust with those who will quickly no longer be strangers.
This is a this is a platonic, non-romantic, CONSENT based event. We facilitate non-sexual touch. Come Sober!

events.title: Consentual body buffet - Sensorial experience mediated by raspberries and whipped cream 😽🍓
events.event_description:
Some options to spark your imagination:
-Family friendly: Raspberries on fingers topped with whipped cream (incl. vegan option) 
-Couple's body buffet: after consent, whipped cream and/or raspberries applied to person laying on massage bed, partner laps it off
-Kinky body buffet: after consent, (blindfolded) volunteer gets whipped cream/raspberries applied on parts of body for which consent was given. Friends are invited to lap it off.

events.title: Prop Library, Flow Jam, and Skill Shares
events.event_description: Stop by and try out a prop! If you're new to flow props we would love to gift you some training. If you're a pro, we'd love to learn from you. We will have practice staffs, double staves, poi, hoola hoops, rope darts, levi-wands, silk fans, and a diablo to try out. Spontaneous jams are welcome! Come and flow with us!

events.title: Consentual body buffet - Sensorial experience mediated by raspberries and whipped cream 😽🍓
events.event_description:
Some options to spark your imagination:
-Family friendly: Raspberries on fingers topped with whipped cream (incl. vegan option) 
-Couple's body buffet: after consent, whipped cream and/or raspberries applied to person laying on massage bed, partner laps it off
-Kinky body buffet: after consent, (blindfolded) volunteer gets whipped cream/raspberries applied on parts of body for which consent was given. Friends are invited to lap it off.

events.title: Kitty Licking Contest
events.event_description: Wednesday @ Midnight… Cat Camp! in collaboration with 👅 Hotel Notel is hosting a Kitty Licking Contest! 😺😻🍒Bring your partner(s) or meet one/some there at our partner(s) consent matchup. 💕❤️💕  Hosted by Eggnog Queen in the Red Light District. 🚨🚨🚨❤️ Yes, you can be an audience member. 😻 Judging criteria is improv by our amazing judges. Strict no phones rule! 😻👅😻👅 Happy Meowgasms!

events.title: Cigar Box Shrines @ Bunny Camp (site 28)
events.event_description:
🎨✨ Cigar Box Shrines @ Bunny Camp (site 28)✨🎨 Friday • 10 am-1 pm 

Join us for a serene morning of plein air creativity by the water-where the breeze is light, the vibes are high, and the muses are wearing bunny ears.

We’ll be crafting mini cigar box shrines to house your LOF treasures and sacred oddities-tiny altars for the weird, the wonderful, and the deeply personal.

🖌️ Plus: painting, drawing, and watercoloring in true en plein air fashion (that’s fancy French for "making art outside").

Supplies provided.

events.title: Pranayama ( Breathwork ) Class
events.event_description:
Pranayama, often called yogic breathing, is a practice focused on controlling and extending one's breath to enhance physical and mental well-being.  

/      PLEASE BRING: Something comfortably to sit on: A yoga mat, a chair, a blanket, a pillow. AND WATER! 

/      CLASS: Starts every 1/2 hour.

events.title: Lost & Found: Treasures from the Halls of Atoms Family High
events.event_description:
Did you lose your glittery hoop earring during cheer tryouts? Misplace your Trapper Keeper full of doodles and secret crush lists? Or maybe you’ve just been emotionally separated from your favorite scratch-and-sniff sticker that smelled like root beer and dreams?

Everything eventually finds its way to the Lost & Found.

Come dig through the mysterious, magical, and mildly chaotic bins of Atoms Family High’s Lost & Found, where forgotten treasures and fabulous oddities resurface to find their rightful (or completely new) owners.

*This is not the event lost and found, but a fun place to get swag or treasures provided by the Atoms Family camp members

events.title: Disabili-Buddies Chat
events.event_description: Join fellow disabled burners in a discussion about what it's like to navigate Lakes of Fire and other burns as a disabled person. What barriers do you face and what has been helpful to you? What language feels affirming to you when describing your disabilities? Where do you stand on the reclamation of the word "crip"? We're excited to share space with you at Y'allville.

events.title: Buddy Bench
events.event_description:
Welcome to Feelin Jelly's Buddy Bench!

Got a group of life forms (humans, human analogs and non human entities are all equally loved here) and want to practice some radical inclusion?  Well if someone is sitting on the bench, maybe ask them to join your group!

Feelin a little down?  A little Jelly?  Want a rest or wanna meet new peeps and don't know how?  Have a seat, and hopefully a group will pick you up!

events.title: Plushie Shibari - Rope 'n Sketch
events.event_description: Two artly activities in one event!  Engage your Japanese bondage rope tying skills (or lack thereof) with your own plushie or use one of ours.  Let’s share tips, stories, and camaraderie over this unique form of art.  And we'll also provide sketching pads, pencils, charcoal, and markers for those who want to draw the bondage plushies!  All levels of expertise welcome.

events.title: Buzz Button Drink Expierance
events.event_description: It's not just a drink, it's an experience. We're serving up a drink with an edible flower that will make your mouth tingle and is reminiscent of a feeling somewhere between a mouth full of pop rocks and licking a 9-volt battery. It will be happening when it's happening, so don't trust this time slot. Look for the event on our sign.

events.title: Under the Covers GAME SHOW & Cover Song Guessing Contest
events.event_description:
Join BenmeR and Whirlwind for the return of our interactive game show!
We will be playing unique/abstract cover versions of popular songs and it's up to you to identify the original artists. Winners of each round are showered in glory and praise. Your musical prowess will be highlighted and your earballs will be pleased!

events.title: Kitty Licking Contest
events.event_description: Friday @ Midnight… Cat Camp! in collaboration with 👅 Pleasure House is hosting a Kitty Licking Contest! 😺😻🍒Bring your partner(s) or meet one/some there at our partner(s) consent matchup. 💕❤️💕  Hosted by Eggnog Queen in the Red Light District. 🚨🚨🚨❤️ Yes, you can be an audience member. 😻 Judging criteria is improv by our amazing judges. Strict no phones rule! 😻👅😻👅 Happy Meowgasms!

events.title: Choke the Chicken Malort Shots
events.event_description: Do you like rubber chickens? Do you love to hate a mysterious, vaguely grapefruit infused wormwood liqueur from a certain windy city? WELL DO I HAVE THE EVENT FOR YOU! Choke down your crappy shot while doing mouth to mouth with your favorite fowl, and take your new pet chicken home with you! Start a chicken band? Form a chicken parade? The choices are endless! Give us your best Malort squawk!

events.title: Gender Explorers Play Party!
events.event_description:
A sexy space just for all you gender diverse folx! Join us at Pleasure House (Site L in the East End) for a night of trans focused pleasure. 

If you’re gender diverse and you’d like to bring your partner who isn’t, you may! They’re welcome as long as they’re cool around trans folx and their bodies.

Last thing, if you’re reading this and thinking, "I’m not trans enough for this" - you are! We want you here!

events.title: Art is For Everybody Art Space and Art Gifting Wall
events.event_description: Stop by our camp, day or night, and make some art to hang on our Art Gifting Wall, or take home beautiful (or beautifully ugly!) art someone created just for you! Visit our art space to create a masterpiece on recycled material and hang it up to gift on our Art Gifting Wall; or check out the wall to find something wondrous to bring home. Unconventional art welcome -- if you think it's art and you want to share, hang it up!

events.title: Knotty Bits and Leggy Tricks
events.event_description:
Rope, Rhythm, and the Art of Intimate Connection

Curious about the sensual world of rope bondage? Whether you’re brand new or looking to refine your foundation, this hands-on intro to Shibari will tie it all together. We’ll explore the art of kinbaku - the Japanese practice of using rope not just for restraint, but for connection, emotion, and energy exchange.

This class covers:
	•	Foundational ties: single column, double column, and the Guatemalan tie
	•	Rope safety & anatomy: including nerve damage risks and how to avoid long-term harm
	•	Negotiation, consent, and aftercare: because rope without communication is just string
	•	Connection, flow, and the intention behind the bind

Come solo, partnered, or in a pod - all bodies and experience levels are welcome. Rope will be available to borrow, or bring your own if you’ve got it. This is a safe, inclusive space for learning, asking questions, and feeling out the rhythm of rope.

events.title: Kinky Karaoke (pending sound ok)
events.event_description:
A Consent-Fueled Game of Groans, Gags & Chaos

Ready to lose your voice in more ways than one? Step up to the mic and belt out your favorite bangers - while our crew of gleeful deviants tries their hardest to make you scream before you can finish your song. That’s right: this is karaoke, but with hands, toys, feathers, floggers, breath play, and delicious distraction (all consensual, of course).

Sing if you dare - but don’t expect to stay in key when someone’s crawling under your sarong or whispering filthy things in your ear. Voyeurs, exhibitionists, sadists and songbirds - all are welcome. You can participate as a singer, a distractor, or a very enthusiastic audience member.

Consent and communication are non-negotiable: all consent will be given live, right before each performance, and can be revoked at any time - including mid-song. All safewords will be strictly respected. No consent? No touch. Just enthusiastic, campy chaos.

Come to scream, croon, moan, or marvel - but whatever you do, don’t expect to leave with your dignity fully intact.

events.title: Singles Friendly Play Party
events.event_description:
Our big event tent transforms at night into an Ask First play space, zipped up tight to protect unsuspecting (and unconsenting) eyes.

Friday night, come on down for our singles friendly play party, theme-free and open to all. This is an especially good night for folks who enjoy exhibitionism and voyeurism. Check out our space, or get reacquainted! A little cat told us that a kitty licking contest will be happening at midnight.

events.title: Bring-A-Buddy Play Party
events.event_description:
Our big event tent transforms at night into an Ask First play space, zipped up tight to protect unsuspecting (and unconsenting) eyes.

Saturday night after the burn, bring a friend or two and-as a twosome, threesome, or moresome-come celebrate our final night together by reveling in Pleasure House’s legendary annual post-burn partnered-only play party!

events.title: Drag Happy Hour
events.event_description: Grab a drink at the bar and join our host, Bentley James, at her LoF debut for a fabulous show! This open stage drag show features first time entertainers and professionals from the Michigan drag community. Want to get in on the action? Come twirl with us!

events.title: Drink, Bitch! On the go: Rice Krispie Cart
events.event_description:
You might be run over by this cart, or you might be run over by people flocking to it. 

We have over 50 lbs of rice krispy treats in various manifestations to enjoy, as well as some mobile beverages. 

But a twist....you can sing along with Craptastic Karaoke, answer a trivia question or, don't, and just grab a treat. 

Kid-safe. Adult-approved. Beverages, too. Hydration matters so, Drink, Bitch! 

**Vegan and dairy-free treats: limited quantity, unlimited deliciousness**. 

Vote Nancy and Vote Often.

events.title: Cat Pose: Sunbeam Stretching with Cat Camp!
events.event_description: Feeling a little tight? Maybe you're sore from all that work setting up camp. Maybe you've inadvertently carried some tension with you from default reality into the Burn? Whatever the reason, tis the season ...for stretching! Come get loose and let go of all that tension with the kitty clowder at Cat Camp! We'll have some blankets laid out for you, but feel free to bring a yoga mat, towel, or whatever else you need to get your Burn started off on the right paw. Meow!!

events.title: Cat Ladies and Cocktails - Non-alcoholic
events.event_description: Fluff your cat ears, groom your tail, and don your fluffiest bathrobe to join Mom Camp for fancy non-alcoholic cocktails, with a catnip twist. Forget that bum dad for one blissful hour, have a puff of catnip, and sip on paw-sitively fancy non-alcoholic beverages (served with a side of sass), including our doctor-prescribed meowgaritas, tailquila sunrises, and gin and pawnics. We'll be purring along to lounge music, providing mismatched couches to laze about on, and sponsoring a warm glow of chaotic motherly energy and feral joy. Cat ears and back scratches will be available on a first-come, first-serve basis.

events.title: Atoms Family High: Substitute Teacher Takeover
events.event_description:
The teachers at Atoms Family High have mysteriously called out for the day, so we’ve brought in an all-star cast of substitute teachers who definitely didn't read the lesson plan… and may or may not have pre-gamed in the faculty lounge.

Subjects? Unclear. Qualifications? Questionable. Enthusiasm? Absolutely unhinged.

Whether you’re here to learn something weird, heckle your inebriated instructor, or simply relive the glory days of big hair and even bigger attitudes, this is your chance to sit in the back of the classroom and pass notes, not judgment.

Because at Atoms Family High, the only rule is: There are no rules, but you won't want to miss getting a hall pass!

events.title: Cowboy Coffee
events.event_description: Coffee Up makes the best coffee this side of the Mississippi! Using a  formula that was perfected on the range, you are going to get a fresh and hot cup of coffee that will keep your burn going even when you are running out of steam. Served by the sassiest of baristas, each cup is served up with a generous helping of snark mixed with a splash of good tidings. Will you ever have a better cup of coffee? Probably. Will it ever be in better company? Also probably ... but we guarantee one thing: You are never going to forget Coffee Up!

events.title: Co-Working Space at the Teletwerkers Day Lounge
events.event_description: "Working from home?" We get it. Trying to balance day jobs and other responsibles WHILE at a burn is the actual worst. So, "work" from "home". All those air quotes mean business! And you too could mean business! Come by, hop on our wifi, maximize your productivity, synergize your deliverables, enjoy our office decor, and have some custom lattes from Starboofs while you get some work done with the Teletwerkers! Business attire required and provided!

events.title: Cat Camp! Adopt-a-Cat Mega event!
events.event_description:
Ever wanted a cat you could dance with, tell secrets to, or take on a spontaneous adventure through the Burn? Come to Cat Camp! and browse our fine selection of adoptable "Cats"-furry, flirty, feral, and fabulous. Give one a scratch behind the ears, take one for a stroll, or join in the feline fun and be a cat yourself!

Craft your own pet tags, make a set of cat ears, or enjoy some coloring and other delightful things at our kitty craft station. Whether you're looking for a playful tabby, a moody void cat, or something in between, we’ve got the purr-fect companion for you. Adoptions are temporary, but the memories will last nine lives.

events.title: Retro 80s Picture Day
events.event_description:
Smile like your mom forced you to because it’s awkward high school photo day at The Atoms Family, and we’ve got the retro backdrop to prove it.

Channel your inner yearbook legend: think popped collars, side ponytails, frosted tips, and that one pose where you're aggressively leaning on nothing.

We’ll provide the backdrop and you bring the drama.

events.title: Lusty Thumper’s Menu of Breastly Delights
events.event_description: Are you a fan of hefty breasties?  Then pay Lusty Thumper a visit at the Pleasure house to pick your own Titsperiance flight.  From gentle embraces and relaxing massages to invigorating smacks, Lusty is sure to deliver the Breastacular experience of a lifetime. Stripper etiquette applies.(No touching but you will be touched)

events.title: Live Concert featuring The Velvet Sundown
events.event_description: AI supergroup The Velvet Sundown will be playing a live performance Thursday evening through the power of Kessler Thursday evening at 9 p.m.

art.title: Adorable Door of Doors
art.description: Come explore tiny worlds of wonder through the interactive adorable Doors exhibit located in the Backyard Camp of Dere Kamp. Contribute to and alter a variety of alternate worlds like the divine creature you are.

art.title: Beyond the Threshold: Creature Chronicles
art.description: “Come one, come all, to the Creature Curio! See the creatures throughout the ages. Open the doorways to explore time and leave with a belief in all things unseen. We hope our depictions and evidence will help show you how much of the world has been hidden and that mystery still exists.“

art.title: Burn Brite (formerly Life Brite)
art.description: Step into a world of vibrant color and creativity with this life-size Lite-Brite, a nostalgic journey designed to awaken your inner child. Made up of hundreds of glowing pegs, the installation invites visitors to interact with the piece and others. A celebration of both nostalgia and creativity, whether you’re reliving your childhood memories or experiencing the magic for the first time, it’s a place where you can rediscover the joy of making something beautiful, one glowing peg at a time.

art.title: D!ck Biting Fish
art.description: Beware of Disco d!ck biting fish! A public service Paper Mache display of the biting fish at Lucky Lake!

art.title: Dont be TARDY to the Party
art.description: Enter the TARDIS and select your destination. While traveling through the doorways of time, our very talented doctor will help transform you into an other-worldy being (via body paint) and make your burn more magical!

art.title: Doors of Truth
art.description: Keep an eye out while on your laps around the lake for 10 strangely decorated faerie doors. Open them and you just might find a smile, a laugh, or a fun story to tell your campmates.

art.title: Effigy Kiln
art.description: Glazing-a-Trail - Glaze your own Lakes of Fire ceramic tile to be experimentally fired in the Effigy and take home a piece of this year's burn!

art.title: Equity Concourse
art.description: Play on this pathway to equity, open doors to whitewashed histories, and reflect on belonging. Daily live justice readings “opening doors” to author philosophers Audre Lorde, James Baldwin, Peggy Mcintosh, and Bell Hooks. “Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced." -  James Baldwin

art.title: Fairy Homes
art.description: Doors have opened from all over the fairy realms! Come visit our hidden hideaways and magical homes. Be sure to stop by day and night, our doors are always open.

art.title: Fire and Rain
art.description: Combining the elements of fire and water, themselves constantly in a state of flow and change, to highlight to the observer the ever-changing nature of each moment in their own passage through time.

art.title: Galaxy Pools
art.artist: by Jamie Honeycutt and Doc Womp
art.description: Get lost in the mesmerizing Galaxy Pools. Spin the installation to watch it dynamically form, then stop it to witness the captivating swirls of particles, reminiscent of the distant reaches of space.

art.title: Heart Symphony
art.description: Do you want to see your heart manifested in physical form? You are invited to add your heart song, and to listen to the heart songs of hundreds of participants. Please seize the opportunity to customize a cd with what makes your heart sing. This piece is intended to inspire meaningful conversations and allow everyone to make a little art to raise the frequency of our hearts, as we express ourselves and the things we love. At the center of the piece, you will find a Large Disco Heart being a witness to all of our songs.

art.title: Knows-It-All
art.description: Pestered by a burning curiosity? The Knows-it-All Can Help! Made famous for its proprietary catalog of all spacetime, the Knows-it-All is the pinnacle of temporal search engines.

art.title: Kyklos (formerly Kuklus)
art.description: On the shores of Lucky Lake stands a larger than life monument to infinity, temporality, and the endless cycle of birth, death, and rebirth. At approximately 10 feet tall, this looming, burning ouroboros rises from the shallows. Its presence is emblematic of boundlessness, cyclicality, and duality

art.title: Lakes in Time
art.description: Stop by and color a pre-drawn square, and then come back on Friday. All of the colored squares will be assembled to display our community mural, showing the Lakes of Fire effigies through time!

art.title: Leather and Limericks
art.description: Do you want to build a leather festival harness with pouches to carry your essentials? We have designed these so no experience or skill with leatherwork is needed. Come get your build on!

art.title: Letters to Alyson
art.description: You’re wondering through the woods and you stumble upon an illuminated portal. Your sense of wonder draws you in and upon closer inspection you notice an ethereal figure that beckons you to the letter writing station. Letters to Alyson invites you to engage in a self guided exploration of queer loss and grief that we are often denied in default. Need a place to have a private cry for a moment? We got you.

art.title: Light Way of Delight
art.description: An installation of stained glass and prisms to enchant your eyes with color and light.

art.title: Mermaid of Jawscream
art.description: The hard working members of Frozen Kraken Fishery have pulled up our nets and wrenched from the sea more than just our 100% cruelty-full Dolphin Bits. Is it a woman? No! Is it a shark? Not quite! Is it an eldritch being from beyond the doors of time? Almost definitely. Come see this siren of the creepy deep and watch as the flux-tuations of the time stream transform her.

art.title: Mondo Trasho Be Divine
art.description: Mobile shrine to Divine spreading the good word of Ask First consent around the lake.

art.title: Not-So-Secret-Door
art.description: A pop-up speakeasy door that randomly moves around Lakes of Fire. Can you find it? Can you guess the password?

art.title: Giant Parade Puppet
art.description: A towering traveler roams the lakeside, reaching out across time to participate in your theme camp like any other participant, except twice as tall.

art.title: Pillars of Eutheria
art.description: A collection of illuminated, iridecent pillars to help light and guide your burn.

art.title: Pixel Prism
art.description: Open this door and let your mind escape to a world of prismatic possibility

art.title: Portals of the Eternal Grove
art.description: "Journey across time and space through the Portals of the Eternal Grove! What wonderful magic awaits at the center of the universe where all things are connected?"

art.title: Rex
art.artist: by Meg Selvig and Jack Hoefnagel
art.description: "Leave your mark, and become part of the story of Lucy and Rex, a time traveling dinosaur that ends up in Valhalla, on a mission to reunite with his best friend and protect nature's magic."

art.title: Slow Dance
art.artist: by Matt Riley and Tim Wood
art.description: You put your arms around their body. Music swells to a crescendo. The lights get brighter, your heart races. This is the magic you’ve been waiting for; a moment of intimacy for you and yours. Step onto the circle and let the music be your guide. Slow Dance is a motion-activated platform that plays romantic/cheesy slow-dance music, for people to make memories with. Lakes of Fire is about that heat, and so is Slow Dance; let it light the fire, or keep it burning. The installation will be accessible any time, day or night.

art.title: Space Invasion Mobility Trailer
art.description: A long time ago in a galaxy far far away a young man demands to go where he has never gone before. Join Lucas's Lair to ride on a wheelchair accessible mutant spaceship. A ramp provides individuals with mobility aids a way to travel the galaxy of Lucky Lake without the need to transfer.

art.title: Steps Through the Sands of Time
art.description: At Stepping through the Sands of Time, find yourself transported to ancient egypt and come learn about the empire that sprung up around the nile. Learn about the castes that made up an empire that spanned millenia and see yourself in their place.

art.title: Stripper Terrarium
art.description: The Sexy Space Raiders From Space are studying the human art of dancing and WE NEED YOUR HELP! We're asking all groovy Urthlings to hop in our state of the art Stripper Terrarium and generate mountains of data with their most human dance moves!

art.title: Swingways in Time
art.description: Travel to another era through the swingways of time

art.title: T.A.R.D.I.S by the Lake Escape Room
art.description: Enjoy solving puzzles and traveling through time with your companion in a big blue box?  Then the T.A.R.D.I.S. by the Lake Escape Room is something you shouldn't miss.  Come take a look inside our T.A.R.D.I.S to see if you have what it takes to solve our time travel escape room.

art.title: The Cozy Crochet Dome Project 2025
art.description: 12x7 foot dome covered in crocheted yarn. 16 panels each a different color and pattern.

art.title: The Dorothy Project
art.description: The Dorothy Project is an interactive art piece that tells the story of beloved fictional characters, living in a modern world with challenges mirroring those of ours. Dorothy must race, against a storm, to save her friends from the division, discord, and discontentment caused by “The Man”.

art.title: The Labyrinth of Chaos and Becoming
art.description: The Labyrinth of Chaos and Becoming: An immersive art experience that mirrors the unpredictability of life, The Labyrinth of Chaos and Becoming invites participants to explore a maze filled with playful disorder and profound reflection. At its center lies a sanctuary for self-connection and self-compassion, offering tools to rediscover one’s true self. Through this journey, participants embrace life’s chaos as a pathway to growth and transformation, celebrating the beauty of becoming.

art.title: The Lame Show Network
art.description: Step into The Lame Show Network for a one-of-a-kind game show experience at Lakes of Fire! Participate in cheesy, interactive game shows like Cheese or No Cheese, Framily Feud, and The Cheesy Match Game. Whether you're competing as a contestant or cheering from the sidelines, expect plenty of laughs and friendly competition.

art.title: The Riff Raft
art.description: All aboard! The Rift Raft is a fully interactive wooden pirate ship where participants are invited to create an immersive musical seascape in real time. Turning the ship’s wheel, activating the throttle, hoisting the sails, setting switches on control panels, and cranking the winches allow sonic seafarers to captain their journey and navigate this seascape of sound. Play, collaboration, and community meet to create spontaneous adventures. No two journeys are the same, and every crew member is part of the trip. Day or night, rain or shine, the ship is a sonically and aesthetically engaging platform to unleash your imagination, creating pop-up communities out of whimsical shared experiences.

art.title: The Swing
art.description: The smell of gardenia and sweat dances across a ruddy collarbone. Smashed grass under sateen booties. Spilled Champagne, sweet and sticky on sun-kissed skin. Supple velveteen petals dripping with the dew of the morning twilight. The anticipation of what is to come, and the ennui of what could have been.

art.title: They Glow!
art.description: Neon dinosaur skeletons that glow? That's rad!

art.title: Tiny Thresholds Through Time
art.description: Keep your eyes open for 'Tiny Thresholds Through Time' hidden around the Lake; you may discover thresholds of Lake of Fire past and present, as well as your favorite TV shows or movies. Want a more interactive experience? - Check out Nexus for a bingo card and tiny burning man! Remember, these are TINY thresholds... Keep your eyes low. Good luck and happy hunting!

art.title: Torches of the soul
art.artist: Matt K, Rick M, Rad & Friends
art.description: Torches of the Soul Neo gothic inspired floor and standing fire with a hind of art deco. Constructed from steel, propane, fire and misc hopes and dreams.

art.title: What Time is It?
art.description:
This art piece, "What Time Is It?", invites you to step into a space where the answer is anything but fixed. We often treat time as a universal, objective measure, but for each of us, any given time can mean something entirely different…a looming deadline, a quiet moment of creation, or the start of a new adventure. This installation features clocks gracefully surrendering to their own temporal nature, their forms melting and shifting in a beautiful dissolution.

These aren't instruments to tell the hour, but rather a visual paradox. They embody time as a human-made construct that relentlessly dictates our lives, yet paradoxically, holds no ultimate dominion beyond our individual perception. As you encounter these fluid forms, consider the profound freedom in realizing time's ultimate fluidity and its subjective grip.

Witness the unraveling of the clock and perhaps find your own moment outside of "when." Let's ignore the question of what time is it, and simply be here now, embracing the immediacy of this very moment.

art.title: Where's The Whimsy?: a sensory Seek-and-Find
art.description: While Wandering the Woods, Open every Door you see! Sensory Surprises await while you wonder Where's the Whimsy? provided by That Guy, Shiny, & Some Kid

art.title: Windoors Vista
art.description: Explore the tiny worlds hidden behind doors within doors. Like accidentally clicking a pop-up ad, behind every door lies a carefully curated surprise, though thankfully none of them will ask you to update Adobe Flash Player.

art.title: Wormhole
art.description: Enter another dimension straight out of a Pink Floyd song or Dr. Suess story. Leave your troubles at the door and enter a new plane of existence as Wormhole transports your heart and soul. Oh the places you'll go!

art.title: Bumpy the Angler Fish
art.description: This piece is about creating and protecting space through art. Shaped from metal into the form of an anglerfish, it holds a space within its hull...a space that, through its artistic form, gains cultural value and social protection.In a world where space is often scarce and hard-won, this work offers a mobile, secure environment for creative and cultural expression-one that can travel across the continent, engaging and connecting with diverse communities.

art.title: DRKHRT
art.description: DRKHRT is a fire-breathing representation of Love in the form of a 20' tall pixelated heart made of steel and aluminum. Its large scale flame effects and lighting systems remind you that while love is warm, it can also burn. Come dance and interact to expose some of the secrets love can hold!

art.title: String Theory 2.0
art.description: A spinning string and some blinky lights. String Theory 2 is an art installation that exhibits all 10+ principles simultaneously. Burners love a good challenge and the Principles provide plenty. Principles reveal a continuous stream of solutions.

camps.name: 2 Live Buddy Crew
camps.description: 2 Live Buddy Crew is kickin it old skool to bring you nostalgic 90s beats to bump and grind, take a spin on the stripper pole, spit some karaoke rhymes, and chill in our cannabis lounge, The Green Room! Show us your chronic skillz in the Buddy Crew's first annual 420 games! There will be rolling contests, trivia, drunken "This is Hip-Hop" dance lessons, and more! So stop through in your overalls and bucket hats to rep the illest camp on Lucky Lake!

camps.name: A Little Bit All Over the Place
camps.description: Great food and well. Whatever else we can muster up really. We aim to have a delicous soup or stew ready every night around 7-8. Other than soup you can enjoy freshly baked smoked cookies and join us for a candy pull. Food aside our table is usually loaded with stamps and paint. Wire wrapping sessions and drum circles are not out of the norm. At the end of the day we really are just a little bit all over the place.

camps.name: Atomic Chocolate
camps.description: Atomic Chocolate- comfort, snacks, warm beverages. A perfect place to recharge on your way around the lake, hang out with new friends, or take moment for yourself. Read, play puzzles, color, art and games! Check out the grab a claw and take a selfie in the mirror box.

camps.name: Atoms Family
camps.description: Big hair? Check. Questionable fashion choices? Double check. Whether you were more leg warmers and locker notes or leather jackets and hair bands, this is your chance to relive your gloriously misspent youth with the rest of the Atoms Family. Don’t be late to class—you never know what today’s substitute will be teaching… or wearing. Enjoy the ultimate blast-from-the-past bash at the My Little Pink Pony Palace (aka Grandma’s Attic). We’re talkin’ movies, karaoke, and more nostalgic fun than you can shake a slap bracelet at. 🦄🎤

camps.name: Aunt Marsha Bed and Breakfast
camps.description: Come and stay at your home away from home where we provide you with the ultimate glamping experience. Stay in our luxurious space, where you have the mom-and-pop vibe while you wait for your breakfast. Not staying at our camp? Come and hang out with us in our front room where we have plastic on our couches and butterscotch candies...just like your grandma's house.

camps.name: Basement Fiasco
camps.description: Got hungry burners, depleted burners, bored burners, or burners in need of an outfit change? Come to Basement Fiasco! Back for another year with more basement and more FIASCO, we've got vegan family dinners and tasty trail mixes to nourish hungry mouths, recharge stations for power and hydration, musical entertainment, lucha-door wrestling videos, crafting, and all the seersucker and orange accoutrements to enhance your style. Our chill tent is available for lounging, we keep our beach bar stocked with hydration and sunscreen, and our fiasco of a bar cart will be scooting around the lake and parked at the basement.

camps.name: Beantown
camps.description: Our camp is open to the public! We offer a soothing oasis for resting and socializing during all hours of the burn, and we will be offering jewelry crafting classes, meditation, a queer hoe down, and a beans and weenies dinner.

camps.name: Bermuda Triangle Travel Bureau
camps.description: Come disappear with us! Our unlikely oasis is the preferred accidental destination for flight attendants, sailors, and intergalactic tourists alike. Join us for special events hosted by our travel agents, or engage in self directed experiences anytime, in one of our art structures. Wander around Lucky Lake to discover our three beacons - which form a Devil’s Triangle within Lakes of Fire! Get lost in paradise today! Send Your Baggage to Space Write down or draw things you need to release and let go of - in the Lightyear Rewards Lounge! Place your sentiments in our secure briefcase, and help yourself to artifacts far beyond the tin foil hat. Using alien technology, we will dispose of your baggage by launching it into the sun (burning it).

camps.name: Bikes and Brews
camps.description: Bikes and Brews. Did you expect anything else?! We ride bikes, we drink brews. Coincidentally, you also ride and drink, but like a good time traveler, never together. Stop by and we'll fix your ride or fix ya a drink but only after the wheel decides your fate... We are just your neighborhood dyke bike bar, oh and we also provide the orange community bikes and racks.

camps.name: Blazing Libations
camps.description: Blazing Libations is a community hub where the neighborhood congregates every morning to enjoy a fresh, French pressed cup of coffee, a piping hot cup of tea, or even chai or hot chocolate with varieties accommodating most dietary restrictions and preferences. There is typically conversation as stimulating as the beverages! Join us later in the week for Blazing Libations After Dark, a craft cocktail experience with adult libations.

camps.name: Boogie Woogie Cabaret
camps.description: Boogie Woogie Cabaret is the #1 spot for live music and art around the lake! Connect with your creativity and your community!

camps.name: Break-xodus
camps.description: Camp Break-xodus is kind of a one-trick pony, if that pony showed up during Exodus with bacon, eggs, bagels, coffee, and breakfast burritos! We love hosting a walking rest stop with water, snacks, and a large map of the burn.

camps.name: Bunny Camp
camps.description: Bunny Camp is your place for burner clothing. Looking for that one thing to make your burn perfect, we might have it! We know what you need. Fresh fashion brought out frequently. Come by and your personal shopper will help you. We like volunteers to stop by and help from hanging clothes to being a fashion consultant. For the artist in you, we will have a variety of art supplies for you to use.

camps.name: Camp Brine & Shine
camps.description: Where pickle passion meets breakfast perfection!

camps.name: Camp One More Thing!
camps.description: We have Booze, we have Boingers, and we have Equity for all! Come check out the Equity concourse, have a drink from one of our friendly bartenders and relax while boinger as many things as you can find. Camp One More Thing always brings one more thing to Lakes of Fire!

camps.name: Camp Pop-a-Squat
camps.description: Come one, come all!!!! Come on down to Camp Pop-a-Squat and pop a squat!!!! You’ll be sure to find yourself back in another time…..the 1990’s that is. There will be shaded lounge areas all around, fabulous lighting to tickle your senses and groovy tunes throughout the event. Catch us for spontaneous yoga (S.O.Y.), a variety show and 90’s trivia night. There will be interactive art offering a safe and unique space to decompress through the event. Do you need a moment if peace? Care to bust a move and get down to the music if your past? See familiar or new face and make friends? Well, then come on down to Pop-a-Squat and let us show you what makes us the most comfortable and fun place to chill during Lakes of Fire. And don’t forget we will be bringing back our highly popular dance pole, for all ages! Come on by for a fun lesson or teach us something new!!! Random shows and times, come on by anytime.

camps.name: Camp Quietly
camps.description: Need a low key break? Come visit us at Camp Quietly. Our camp offers a mellow atmosphere for relaxation. Our sensory relief space is welcome to all.

camps.name: Camp Recharge
camps.description: Come visit Camp Recharge to have your power restored physically, spiritually and electronically. We offer hydrating cold beverages, a recharging station, electronic shiatsu back and foot massagers, potable water, a hand washing station, hammocks, first aid kit/over the counter meds, and more!

camps.name: Camp Saicin
camps.description: We’re bringing the heat back to Lakes this year, this time with a permanent name. As you journey through time and spice, stop by Camp Saicin when you realize hot sauce didn’t make your packing list! We'll have hot sauces, hot snacks and more!

camps.name: Camp Side Quest
camps.description: A QUEST! Whether you are indeed seeking a magical side quest to level up your burn, fairy potions and libations at The Cloak and Stagger Tavern, a fire circle with dancing fae, a goblin treasure trove, or simply a cozy chill space and good conversation (and obviously many snacks) with magical beings - we have it all! Step through a dimensional doorway into the fairy realm you have always believed in that now actually exists at Lucky Lake! (n/a drinks and kid friendly)

camps.name: Camp Tramp Stamp
camps.description: Come by Camp Tramp Stamp! Get your stamp if you are feeling like a TRAMP!

camps.name: Cat Camp!
camps.description: Meow!! Indulge your inner feline as you climb our human-sized cat tree, bat around oversized toys, and lounge in cozy nooks built for maximum cattitude. Get crafty with cat-themed art, test your luck at our "Hissing Booth," foster one of our affectionate Human Cats, or strut your stuff on our dance floor as DJs spin tunes that will have you pouncing with joy. Also, don’t miss our “Prowl Around the Lake,” where you can show off your amazing cat style and fashion as we go for a stroll in the biggest cat cluster we can muster up!

camps.name: CAT NAPPERS
camps.description: Are you in purr-suit of relaxation? We welcome you to stop by for calm and care-free cat nap in our enchanted mushroom forest. We also offer a daily assortment of vitamins, lotions, and refreshments for your health and endurance at the altar of our ever-calm parriarch, Bum Cat.

camps.name: Chill Camp
camps.description: Chill Camp is a cozy retreat where art, music, and community meet. By day, explore a curated art gallery featuring burner-made works. By night, enjoy craft cocktails, s’mores by the fire, and smooth DJ sets. Our mission is to foster creativity, comfort, and community—because everyone deserves a place to just chill.

camps.name: Chrono Cats & Gateway Goths
camps.description: We want to provide an opportunity to stop and enjoy a bit of whimsy. Our chill space is situated at the event horizon, so people can come, enjoy a comfortable lounging area, gaze at the field of stars day or night, and choose the flavor of the next moment to experience. Our events will include storytelling, divination, plushie shibari, a Feast with the Fae and more! Visit our stop in time!

camps.name: Church of The 13 Unicorns
camps.description: The 13 Unicorns provide transportation services to altered states and alternate timelines. One-way service only, you have to find your own way home. Before time-travelling, get your spiritual energy in shape with a Chakra tune-up. Our lemonade stand will soothe your parched pipes. Complete a conjugal contract/burner pre-nup with services provided by Bishop Boom Boom and Elder Larry. Chill with a cocktail or mocktail in the 13th Dimension Unicorn Lounge or marvel at the appropriately sacred Temple of Saint Keanu located conveniently just outside the bounds of time and space (under the white church steeple) Door M. No Shoes, No Shirt, No Problem.

camps.name: Coffee Up
camps.description: Coffee Up serves hot, fresh coffee each morning and throughout the day/evening as we’re able. Visitors are welcome to stay and hang out as they enjoy their awake juice or take it to go.

camps.name: Cordial "Plant" Camp
camps.description: Cordial "Plant" Camp is simply delighted to be voyaging from Austin/New Orleans (our established homes) to the Midwest - we've heard the politeness in this state might rival our own cordial charm! We aim to delight the denizens of Lucky Lake with multiple "plant" themed lounge spaces (no plants were harmed in the making of these cozy spots).
