We're also hosting our WORLD FAMOUS Cordial Happy Hour featuring cocktails/mocktails made from home-made botanical cordials, and we're throwing a brand new event just for Lakes of Fire: a Cordial Tea Party which will feed bellies and bewilder minds. Pinkies out, plant friends!

camps.name: Cosmic Disco
camps.description: Cosmic Disco, where galaxies collide and beats transcend time and space! Step into the mothership where the dance floor is your launchpad to the stars. Our DJs spin otherworldly tracks every night starting at 8. Thirsty after shaking your booty? Stop by the cantina for one of our signature cocktails. Join us early afternoons daily for our open decks sessions, or early evening on Thursday and Friday for “Skip a Beat Karaoke”. Make new friends and forge cosmic connections at one of our daily ping-pong tournaments. All travelers are welcome to join in the fun.

camps.name: Crappy Bar
camps.description: Come for a crappy drink. Leave because of the crappy jokes. But don't be hatin' on our crappy music 'cuz we just happy to be here...maybe. This year we are bringing the CRAPPY BARge! We are also hosting several events including a 20 Fucks for 20 Bucks memorial party, a singles mixer and likely a rubber chicken parade. The lounge and bar are open during the day and likely also at night to support our village mates.

camps.name: Dad Camp
camps.description: HOWDY fellow campers. It's your good ol' dad here ! We will have corn hole and coffee most mornings with pop-pop and Daddy or catch any of us roaming with the good ol mobile nickknack black jack mobile ! Where you can bet your finest nickknacks on blackjack !

camps.name: Damp Doodles
camps.description: Stop by, grab a drink and get your doodle on! Leave your evaporating mark on our doodle boards. Just remember... nothing lasts forever.

camps.name: dcbbq
camps.description: bbq is art. The dcbbq is Lakes of Fire’s experiment in the bbq arts. The bbq is ready when it’s ready and it returns in 2025. Beach Meat is back, baby, gifting delicious smoked BBQ until it’s gone. Catch the elusive Meat Wagon if you can, if you dare. Our smokers run all day and all night and we love feeding artists and builders.

camps.name: Deep House of Pancakes
camps.description: Deep House of Pancakes is back for its second year - Deeper. Housier. Pancakey-er? By day, belly up to our bar and enjoy coffee (regular or decaf!), shade, a seat, and a place to just exist for a while. Let our eclectic daytime tunes draw you in, and our totally acceptable coffee and banter keep you hanging out. By night, enjoy a selection of hand-picked DJs spinning house, tech house, disco house, Detroit techno, and of course DEEP house, alongside the most delicious pancakes from a bag from the restaurant supply store you've ever had at 1am.

camps.name: Deep Mysteries Tea House
camps.description: "Meanwhile, let us have a sip of tea. The afternoon glow is brightening the bamboos, the fountains are bubbling with delight, the soughing of the pines is heard in our kettle. Let us dream of evanescence, and linger in the beautiful foolishness of things."

camps.name: Disco Bees
camps.description: Buzz thru the honey hole portal to find the DISCO BEES. Our Hive got groovy – shining, spinning and dazzling. Inside our world of disco funk and nectar vibes, time melts like honey under a disco sun. Buzz Buzz! Stop by to grab your Bee-tastic attire. Join us for a variety of events including a honey bee tea party, hot dawg picnic, roadside cocktails and BEEach party. Watch out for the SWARM - no telling how, when or where it will assemble.

camps.name: Dive Camp Trailer Park
camps.description: What started as a group of scuba diving friends from Dallas has grown over the years with members from San Francisco and Arkansas. We focus on the socialization aspect of burns and our patio is always open, so come sit for a while and visit with us. Join us for omelet-in-a-bag breakfast, cocktails/mocktails, pendant casting, or just come and sit a spell with a refreshing beverage in our relaxed, no-drama atmosphere.

camps.name: Drink, Bitch!
camps.description: Drink, Bitch! is in its 6th year with your favorite off key refreshments! Come join us for scheduled drink offerings: Lemonade social, My Tie Mai Tais, our famous Bloody Mary's, Absinthe Ritual and Apple Pie Moonshine! Come relax and talk story on our world class inflatable couches and explore our Tunnel of Wonder! We offer paddleboard lessons and loaners and suspension /bondage demonstrations for all ages and levels. We have a mobile emergency Rice Krispy and beverage cart, but you must answer questions first!

camps.name: Elemental Waves
camps.description: Elemental Waves — flying through time on a wave of questionable science and undeniable vibes. Where sound and fire collide in a dance so mesmerizing, you'll wonder if you're tripping (you might be). By day, we’re semi-responsible adults. By night, we gather around our not-so-metaphorical fire contraption, summon the flame spirits, and pretend we understand how any of it works. Come for the spectacle, stay for the sass. BYO marshmallows (just kidding, they’ll melt instantly).

camps.name: El Pepinillo Resbaladizo (The Slippery Pickle)
camps.description: Come get slippery with some pickle backs! Heck I don't know! Mostly daytime but will be piggybacking off of San Escobars shenanigans. Day town drinks and few events, we are being a little low key this year we are 99% Canadian and may be short staffed due to political reasons

camps.name: Evolutionary Illumination
camps.description: Evolutionary Illumination invites you to to interact with 3 giant interactive fractal video kaleidoscopes! Driven by the magic of Lakes of Fire and its participants, our feedback rigs respond to people in a magically interactive experience in front of three giant evolving, revolving, walls of color and dance. Feedback in the video creates never-the-same patterns, color and light shows that react to participants playing, dancing, spinning, and contemplating the edges of light and wonder.

camps.name: Feeling Jelly
camps.description: Welcome to Feeling Jelly! We're a fun new camp based on happy memories of PB&Js, Jelly Donuts, Booze and Friendship! Have hard feelings? Leave them on our Wall of Jelly to get them out of your head! Need a friend? Have a sit on our Buddy Bench so others know you are looking for some radical inclusion! Feeling adventurous? Ask for a Dark side Jello shot and see what fun flavors await you! Need a sugary pick-me-up? Grab a jelly donut to satiate your hungers!

camps.name: Firewater Lounge
camps.description: "We’re not the loudest camp on the block. We’re not the flashiest. But we’ve been doing this longer than most of these sparkle ponies have owned a pair of boots. This isn’t our first rodeo—it’s just the latest round of beautiful, blistered tradition. Call us misfits, old heads, the jaded and the janky. We show up anyway. Every year. We bring the grit, the grind, and the good stuff: shade that doesn’t collapse in a windstorm, snacks that taste like someone gave a damn, and drinks poured heavy by hands that know the weight of a long shift. We trade spectacle for soul. You won’t get blasted by bass here—but you will get fed, hydrated, and maybe even hugged by someone who's seen some things."

camps.name: First Fires
camps.description: First Fires is the everything camp! We have dj's playing most nights. We offer self service interactive space in our lounge/cave 20x30 24/7 where persons can take a book from our library, play an instrument from our selection, or cuddle and commune with other like minded raccoons. We provide DJ sets multiple times during the week. Open mic and other various performances at various times throughout. We will update the who/what/where/when with details on more programming as we get closer to the event. The Aerial Rig is available for public use and or learning so long as one of our resident performers is on hand.

camps.name: Flow My Gosh!
camps.description: FLOW MY GOSH! Get excited! We are returning with our bigger and better flow prop library and flow space with the goal of curating a welcoming and creative atmosphere for flow artists of all levels. Hosted events include a community fire jam on at least one night of the burn, a 90’s dance party power hour, a pancake breakfast, and various skill shares throughout the burn. Treats and gifts will be presented by our mascot art installation, OCTOPOI!!!

camps.name: Frequencia
camps.description: Frequencia is a laid-back haven for time travelers and wanderers alike. Stop by for a drink, unwind during our daily sound bath in the Vibratorium, play quirky bar games, or chill by the fire pit. We're all about exploring how frequency, energy, and vibration shape life and consciousness. By tuning into these subtle forces, we deepen our self-awareness and connection to the universe. Whether you're here for a laugh, a snack, a sage smudge, or simply some peace, Frequencia offers a welcoming space to relax, vibe, and explore the magic of being—no matter where (or when) you're from.

camps.name: Frozen Kraken Creamery
camps.description: Frozen Kraken Creamery is here to fill your mouths with our delicious cream! Frozen Kraken Creamery is a bastion of gifting and a break from the heat at the lake. Catch us making the circle with our cart, stop by for one of our ice cream events, or kick back in our ice cream parlor! Now with more dolphin bits!

camps.name: Funky Tiki
camps.description: The Funky Tiki is a campy island resort gone off the rails, tourists welcome, shirts optional. Our 64-foot geodesic dome pulses with a 20kW QSC sound field, surrounded by towering Tikis and fire poofers. The twin tipis serve up drinks and shade, while our groovy lounge channels vintage resort charm with a wink of motel sleaze. But the real action’s on the floor, where we go hard all night, every night. Fire, lasers, projection mapping, it’s a tropical fever dream. Come get weird, get sweaty, and burn it down ‘til sunrise.

camps.name: Green Fairy Sanctuary
camps.description: We are creating a space to foster intimate experiences and a sense of wonder, connecting individuals and the natural world, drop by to pick up seeds cultivated by your fellow burners, or offer your own up for others to grow!

camps.name: Hi Camp Bye Camp
camps.description: Hi Camp, Bye Camp is all about embracing play and creativity! From the quiet creativity offered in the hidden worlds of a book in a library to the awe-inspiring playfulness of serving delicious cocktails from an aerial apparatus! From the silliness of juggling dildos to acrobatics to the power of cracking whips. Embracing what feels good and doing it safely is how we roll.

camps.name: HippoCampUs
camps.description: At HippoCampUs, our LoF experience is a playful yet thoughtful exploration of how we connect with our bodies, each other, and our sense of belonging. Each moment is a chance to affirm, embrace, and express our journey of connection. The atmosphere is one of safety, togetherness, and open-hearted communication, in a space that encourages reflection and dialogue. Just as the hippocampus stores declarative memories, HippoCampUs encourages participants to internalize and store moments of connection, affirmation, and growth. These are not memories but emotional markers that are part of us, linking bodies and minds that guide our understanding of self.

camps.name: Hotel Notel
camps.description: Welcome to Hotel Notel, where your deepest desires come to life in an oasis of indulgence. Step into a world where fantasies know no bounds and exploration is encouraged. Our kink-friendly haven offers more than just a luxurious camp – it's an invitation to embrace your sensuality! Join us for tantalizing adventures crafted to ignite your passions and elevate your experience. From intimate shibari rope tying sessions to exhilarating spanking and flogging seminars, our expert-led classes guarantee an education in pleasure like no other.  At Hotel Notel, judgment is left at the door, creating a safe space where you're free to explore and express yourself without inhibition. Indulge in the ultimate escape where fantasy meets reality.

camps.name: Huggery
camps.description:
"The Huggery is a space of embrace for the ethically affectionate. We specialize in consensual cuddles, silly slaps, regulated rib-squeezes, and high-quality hugs— never unsolicited, always sincere. Whether you are spicy for a slap or in harmony with hugs, we got you covered. To further our love of connection, we’ll have open massage tables for you to use during community hours. 
Consent is our cornerstone. Comfort is our currency. Come for the hugs, stay for the humanity. Side effects may include joy, laughter, and restored faith in humanity."

camps.name: ILLUMINATION
camps.description: ILLUMINATION - LIGHTING UP THE DARKNESS WITH VIDEO, GAMES AND LED LIGHTING

camps.name: Inflatable Camp
camps.description: Step into another world at Inflatable Camp! We will blow your mind with art and Inflatable sculptures from a few of your favorite Inflatable artists. Enter through the magnificent arch, Clairvoyance into Wormhole.  Prepare your mind for interdimensional travel as you enter Wormhole only to land on the shorelines of San Escobar. Take a magical stroll in the Inflatable garden surrounding the massive Inflatable caterpillar vortex while enjoying the sounds of your favorite DJs.

camps.name: It's the Little Things
camps.description: Get stung by the Luv bUGHs! Why not celebrate the little things that make life sweet as a Cupcake! A warm smile, a shared laugh, an act of kindness, a sweet treat, or a Love Shot, we aim to fill your spirit. Come grab some Luv bUGH gear and wear love loud and proud. Be a Luv Bugh or Luv Bugh a Bee – spread the love, consensually of course. Get stung by the Luv bUGHs! Why not celebrate the little things that make life sweet as a Cupcake! A warm smile, a shared laugh, an act of kindness, a sweet treat, or a Love Shot, we aim to fill your spirit. Come grab some Luv bUGH gear and wear love loud and proud. Be a Luv Bugh or Luv Bugh a Bee – spread the love, consensually of course.

camps.name: Jupiter's Arcade
camps.description: Jupiter's Arcade offers the 200 most popular video games from 30+ years ago. All on a tiny Raspberry Pi with easy menu of games from Nintendo, SNES, N64, Playstation1, Sega Genesis, and Arcades like Ms PacMan, Galaga, DonkeyKong, MarioKart 64, Super Smash, Super Mario, Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, Sonic, Tony Hawk, Ninja Turtles, Simpsons, Tetris, and so many more. Mention this ad to Jupiter for sticker or patch. We will also have a cool projection art piece called Quantum Colors.

camps.name: Kessler's Cantina
camps.description: We're a crash-landed crew of misfit outlaws embracing the space-western genre in all aspects. We'll be making some camp adjustments bringing the cantina to it's first warm-weather event, serving tea and tunes, via human DJs and our snarky, interactive AI jukebox.

camps.name: Kidsville
camps.description: Kidsville is a collective of families who come together as a village to make fun stuff happen for our baby burners! Stop by the kids lemonade stand and make sure to STOP and play red light, green light along the road!

camps.name: Kitten Korral
camps.description: Kitten Korral presents the Kitty Kat speakeasy Loungr. Cross tlo the unknown through the temple portal of Bastet the Cat Goddess and imbibe the ancient nectars infused with herbs and sppices from afar dance to vibes spoken word karaoke whip cream body licking and more

camps.name: Lamp Camp
camps.description: Lamp Camp is a dazzling playground of light, laughter, and limitless fun! By night, the air hums with live music, frosty drinks at our iconic Cocktail bar Just The Tip, and the cozy glow of crackling fires. By day, the magic continues with energizing movement workshops designed to heal and rejuvenate. Explore awe-inspiring interactive art, immerse yourself in playful vibes, and let the radiant energy of Lamp Camp spark your creativity and joy. Whether you’re dancing, chilling, or connecting, every moment here is a burst of brightness—your ultimate haven for fun and renewal!

camps.name: Lappin' Good
camps.description: Highly interactive and sensorial experience mediated by raspberries and whipped cream/chocolate sauce Chose from a set menu: 1. Family friendly: Raspberries on own fingers topped with whipped cream (incl. vegan option) or chocolate sauce. 2. same as 1 but consented lapping/eating from partners fingers 3. Couple's body buffet: after consent, whipped cream and/or raspberries/chocolate sauce applied to person laying on massage bed, partner laps it off 4. Kinky body buffet: after consent, (blindfolded) volunteer gets whipped cream/chocolate sauce and/or raspberries applied on parts of body for which consent was given. By-passers are invited to lap it off (anonymously). In addition, we will hand out lollies at our camp and while strolling through the grounds once the burner sticks their lapping tongue out at us.

camps.name: Lemon Party
camps.description: Lemon Party is your citrus sanctuary. Beat the heat and rehydrate in the Lemon Lounge, where zest meets rest. Explore interactive art, or come lounge in the water beneath our shade umbrellas. Don’t miss the swim-up bar—serving Lemon Shots daily at 4pm! Ice-cold lemonade is flowing all day long. Life gave us lemons—so we made you lemonade!

camps.name: LoF Yacht Club
camps.description: Are you Not Sure where to launch your watercraft? Are you Not Sure if you received your watercraft permit? Are you Not Sure about water safety? Did you forget to bring a Personal Flotation Device (PFD)? Come visit us at the LoF Yacht Club we are Not Sure and we can help you out. The YC does not have events planned for this year. Being part of Not Sure Village, our space will be filled with events the Village is hosting. The YC holds space for land bound campers to access the lake without having to battle the maze of tent tie-downs. We offer water safety info via our signage & swag. We offer land bound campers a place to dock their water vessels.

camps.name: Lucas' Lair
camps.description: Journey with Lucas' Lair through the doorways in time to the 1980's. Hang out in a rad 80's arcade, battle classic video game foes, or try your hand at our exclusive 16 bit Lakes of Fire video game. Guide your character around Lucky Lake, picking up moop and solving puzzles. Make sure to get back in time to light the Effigy! Check for the open sign for our culinary adventure back to the late 1900's. See what the lunch lady team has in store for the menu.

camps.name: Lux Ephemera
camps.description: Ingredere, et luceat lux tua. Lux Ephemera is a hyperspatial dance club, a psychedelic chillspace, and overall, a place where you are invited to do what we are all here to do. We welcome you to shine your light with us. Te Amamus. in the earlier week:by the time the sun STARTS THREATENING to move downward, we are up and running. offering amplified sound and handcrafted beverages to order. by the time the sun is fully down we are FULLY ON. lights a blazing, sound is blaring, laughs etc. you know... it's a dance club.

camps.name: Marina Huana
camps.description: San Escobar is not only a destination but also a state of mind. Come experience VIVA culture all hours of the day and night. VIVA!!

camps.name: MEOW*TOWN
camps.description: MEOW*TOWN proves that everything is better when you have a pawsitive catitude. Whether you are singing karaoke, eating treats, boating, dancing, drinking tea, doing arts and crafts, having your future foretold with tarot cards, or learning to dance, it is better when you have on your cat ears. Wiggle your whiskers and get your tail over to MEOW*TOWN.

camps.name: Minnesota Spin Paint (MSP)
camps.description: Come create your own unique Spin Art painting! Minnesota Spin Paint is a guided, interactive, and communal art creation experience where the painter interacts with our lead artists, and the community gathered around to create a masterpiece! We will take you on a journey through the creative arc in a very personal, yet communal way using standard, metallic, and UV paints on our prepared artboards. We provide samples, techniques, tools, supplies and lots of encouragement under the white lights or ultraviolet lights. The result? A 12x12 hardboard painting you take home. Unleash the artist within! Suitable for all ages.

camps.name: Mom Camp
camps.description: Need a hug? We got lots. Stuck in sound camp hell? Come crash on one of our pull-out couches. Need a mom for a minute? We got you. Come see the moms of Moms Camp. Let us ply you with cookies, nag you to wash your hands and guilt trip you about not calling enough. Just stop by and ask for Mom.

camps.name: No Drama Pancake House
camps.description: For the tenth year at Lakes of Fire, the No Drama Pancake House serves up gourmet scratch-made pancakes, with crustaceans and grains, coffee, gourds, and garlic. Each Morning Dish features scratch-made savory, and sweet sensations to titillate your taste buds, satiate your stomach, and flapjack flip your wig with flash-baked bliss. Over the years, we’ve developed a variety of fun traditions like kid cuts, and our in-line test of skill and wisdom: “How old are you, really?” Bring a plate down to camp D between 10ish and noonish to eat hearty and chillax in a zone devoid of drama. Also mimosas.

camps.name: (Not) Not a Camp Camp
camps.description: Welcome to (Not) Not a Camp Camp! Have your parents drop you off at the Portal of Novel(ty), play some classic summer games on our lawn, and Leave a Trace on our canvas art wall! We'll have Tiny Frames for you to create a stunning vision of your doorway in time (or anything else), and pin the art to our Take it Like a Taker canvas wall for folks to discover and take home. You might even get a tour on the lake in our Floating Manta Shade!

camps.name: Nowhere But Here
camps.description: "Nowhere But Here" aims to provide unique gifts and experiences unable to be found elsewhere. This year, come be transported through time and space to live as only the ancients did. Experience life before the common era amongst sand and pyramids.

camps.name: Off-Duty Angels
camps.description: Our communal space consists of two sanctuary shrines (each are 92 SF) flanked by canopies (typically 36 SF) furnished with low tables and cushions for visitors to enjoy refreshment. The sanctuary shrines include multicolor glowing lighting, ambient meditation music, various aromatherapies, and decorated with woven rugs, cushions, tapestries, and floral garlands.

camps.name: Oy My Back 40
camps.description: Journey to Dere Camp for our Door of Adorable Doors into other realities, along with firedancing & food sharing. Rest in the shade. We will have a permanent art installation folks can visit at any time, & otherwise we interact during the middle of the day when we offer food & in the evenings, when we have fire dancing events. Our camp is full of folks who will randomly make 50 sandwiches & cart them around, though. So who knows what else we'll bring.

camps.name: Pizza My Heart
camps.description: Do feel like there's something missing from your life? Do you hunger for meaning and purpose? Stop on by and try to fill the void in your soul with a slice of the good stuff! Pizza My Heart is ready to fill your mouth with the best pizza lucky lake has to offer. Still not satisfied? Quench your perishing thirst for knowledge with a visit to our Museum of Pizza History. Your journey through the eras of pizza is just a doorway away!

camps.name: Pleasure House
camps.description: Pleasure House is a clothing-optional, body-positive, sex positive, Lakes of Fire theme camp. We are queer and straight friendly and we provide a place for campers to enjoy their sensuality. We will have themed parties, nude yoga, play equipment, and other engaging events. Fun and games and giveaways are always offered, and we will be hosting several discussions on topics of interest to the LOF community, including Polyamory, and other TBA pertinent topics. It is our goal to provide fun and information to the LOF community in a safe, fun environment!

camps.name: Radio SGC
camps.description: RadioSGC’s goal is to provide an immersive Lakes of Fire experience that stimulates the mind and body. Where attendees can experience the Burner culture, atmosphere, and artistic expression through the beauty of broadcasting on FM and Digital devices! Tune into volunteer generated content from your car at gate, wherever you camp, at our skillful and consensually placed sound stations, or by joining us live at the radio booth. We even simulcast the Burn soundtrack for those that watch from afar. Want your voice heard? We have a microphone for you and our DJs can promote engagement with your camp's events!

camps.name: Rat City
camps.description: “From the Milwaukee squad that has brought you Home for Wayward and Burners, Goon Garden, and LaGoon Reef, we now present to you: Rat City.  Rat City will have abandoned arcade vibes where you can’t quite tell if you’ve stepped through the past into an 80s vapor-wave arcade dream or into the future to a cyberpunk gaming experience. Scurry on down for rat theme lawn games, mini arcade machines with a collection of your favorite classics, Pack Rat costume closet, a glowing sewer chill space, blender bar margaritas, and musical offerings from our very own Frog Legz and DJ Avalon.

camps.name: Recess
camps.description: If you seek the place for afternoon fun, Recess is your destination. Our oversized yard games are open from dawn til midnight. in the afternoon we provide an uptempo bar and dance area. Interactive art pieces will appear and disappear randomly throughout the week. And, back by popular demand, our 4th year of dildo Races on Friday and Saturday afternoons!

camps.name: Rita's Cafe
camps.description: We are your cozy neighborhood bar or greasy spoon. If your neighborhood is an irradiated wasteland with cannibals and killer robots. Top notch drinks served by exuberant bartenders. Plenty of space to pursue those late night conversations with friends both old and new. There may be a sing along. Come for the survival. Stay for the charm.

camps.name: Sad Kids Club
camps.description: Would you be the savior of the broken, the beaten and the damned? Calling all sad kids to the Sad Kids Club - if you still have band posters on the walls of your bedroom (or wish you did), this is the place for you. Come hang out with your 'elder emo' companions to dance, sing, and cry to all of your favorites that got us through our formative years.

camps.name: Safe Zone
camps.description: Safe Zone is a comforting space filled with queer and poly folks who bring warmth, friendship, and community to life. It’s a place where you can truly be yourself, surrounded by people who celebrate authenticity and connection. With cozy corners like the stuffie pit, inviting drinks at the juice and shot bars, and activities that foster joy, it’s a haven designed for safety and belonging. Whether you’re relaxing, making friends, or sharing in the unique vibe, Safe Zone is where being yourself feels natural and special.

camps.name: San Escobar
camps.description: San Escobar is not only a destination but also a state of mind. Come experience VIVA culture all hours of the day and night. VIVA!!

camps.name: Sarcomere's Cafe
camps.description: We got coffee to start your day. We got coffee to start your night. We got some weights if you wanna work out. We got a fancy chandelier. We might even have live original music.

camps.name: Schott Klinik & Pharmacy
camps.description: Casual space, some liquid offerings, popcorn on demand, Coneys on Friday

camps.name: Sexy Space Raiders From Space
camps.description: We are the Sexy Space Raiders… FROM SPAAAAACE!!! We crash landed on Urth in 2022 and have been making friends with the burners of Lucky Lake ever since! As curious extra terrestrials we want to learn as much as possible about the lives and cultures of Urthlings, so we used our crashed space ship to build a bar called the Flying Saucy for humans to gather in, converse, and connect with each other. Come join us at the Flying Saucy, you get drinks and dancing, and we get to add to our ever-growing collection of knowledge.

camps.name: Sideways Potato People
camps.description: Eat Potatoes, Pray Potatoes, Love Potatoes

camps.name: Silly Town
camps.description: It all started in the Imaginarium Aquarium when one silly mayor dreamed a silly dream ~ a town that's built on shenanigans, laughter, and endless opportunity...to be yourself, be creative, and free. Here there are no laws, no strangers, no foes - just a root tootin' time from your feet to your clown nose! We play all day and dance with fire at night; we are easy to find dripping in black and white. When you stumble upon our town, you will see, just how ridiculously silly we can be. Visit our town and mail a letter at the post office, check out your forever book at the library, find new swag at the market, dance the night away at our DJ parties with fire poofers, see our silly fire station with fire spinners galore, grab some paint and add to our community mural, get rowdy at our blow up clown wrestling, catch our pop up events at our black and white striped booth; face painting, hair braiding, photo booth, mime lessons, hissing booth, and much more! Don't forget to vote for our Mayor!

camps.name: Sluts Next D'Whore
camps.description: Returning to the Red Lakes District this year, the Sluts Next D'Whore are here to provide a variety of playful, interactive, adult-oriented events, activities, and performances. Come through our backdoor in time and experience spicy food parties, naked yoga, and compete in the Slut Olympics.

camps.name: Smoky Bubbles
camps.description: Smoky Bubbles Hookah Lounge. Come enjoy our bubble enhanced hookah lounge, learn the art of smoky bubbles. We will also be have various scheduled activities- get a temporary tattoo at our tatt station, join us by the bonfire for some smores, get a tarot reading or come dance on the sand or enjoy the music afloat on the lake at our beachside lake facing DJ stage setup where we will be featuring rave centric Trance, PsyTrance, Ambient, Electro-Industrial, Techno, and Drum and Bass music sets, and maybe a live band performance or two ;)

camps.name: Snake Oil's Oasis
camps.description: Step right up and be restored by delicious snacks, dispensed with wit and wisdom by Dr. Magnus Bombastus! Experience the one, the only, the legendary Snake Oil Medicine Show! A dazzling display of potions, elixirs, charms and exotic apparatuses to remedy all that ails you. Refreshing snacks and fortifying meats for your mouth and wisdom and curatives for your spirits. snakeoil.ltd for more on LED art and Performance Art.

camps.name: Still Bayou
camps.description: Welcome to Still Bayou, a swamp escape where creativity flows free. Stop in to satisfy your cravings with our sweet Swamp Snacks and Slushies. In true swamp fashion, we'll celebrate the wild side of weather with our legendary Hurricane Party. As evening descends, discover our secrets hidden in time and be rewarded with vintage cocktails. When the moon comes out, a night to revelry, art, and a bit of old fashioned moonshine begins.

camps.name: Struggle Bus
camps.description: Even with the appropriate doorway, time travel is hard. Struggle Bus understands. Take a break from avoiding your past (or future) self and stop in for a pop-up happy hour or relax in our lounge. We have a wide variety of toys, thingys, and fidgets to distract you from the latest temporal paradox. For the professional struggler, we have wearable buses guaranteed to make every task more difficult.

camps.name: Sunrise Saloon
camps.description: Beach facing bar open sunrise hours 5AM-9AM Swinging doors facing the road lead you down the corridor for the big reveal. A place to wind down from the night or ramp up for the day. Enjoy unique and refreshing cocktails while listening to the tinkle of a player piano. Cafe Tables and Comfy Beach Lounging options. Sunglasses/floppy hats/slips/robes/sunscreen available to be sunprepared!

camps.name: Syncytium
camps.description: Syncytium! We're a camp that does. We offer daytime healing and vibes. At night we will have our traditional Syncytium featuring camp DJ's and DJ's from the community, Lot's of fire, lot's of hijinks, and some shenanigans. Keep an eye out for the Anglerfish too!

camps.name: That's What Cheese Said
camps.description: We are gettin’ cheesy with it! Participate in the cultivation of gouda vibrations in our swiss cheese inspired ambiance. Grab a grilled cheese on your loop, or stay, hang, and join us in celebration of all things cheesy.

camps.name: T.H.C. (That Half-Assed Camp)
camps.description: That Half-assed Camp welcomes you to vibe with us in our fully furnished Living Room at Lakes. While you're here, participate in Magic the Gathering, head out on a quest, or munch on our community offerings! Smoking with us is always encouraged, never required!

camps.name: The Catapult
camps.description: A non-alcoholic bar that occasionally serves food and hosts interactive telephone-based projects. At the Catapult, our motto is, "You Bring It, We Fling it"

camps.name: The Coven
camps.description: Seeking colorful conversation? A sparkly set of nails? Or a sip of strong brew? Meet us at The Coven for shellac manicures and homegrown red currant wine by Nail Witch. Walk widdershins around what ails you with a visit to our apothecary.

camps.name: The Funkyard
camps.description: Shop our funky bazaar and envelop yourself in a cornucopia of textures and patterns. Amplify your look and peruse our racks. “Have a snack, or be the snack!” Plus sized rack for the baddie buxom burners. Kids treasure chests and clothing for the youth burners. Come thrift and snack with us. “Funk around and find out!”

camps.name: The Glory Bowl
camps.description: Stop by the delightfully queer and trans centered camp, The Glory Bowl, located within Y’allville. Here, you will receive silly food gifts at The Glory Bowl, a glory hole type structure through which you can snack, get a fun temporary tattoo at our pop-up Lorem Ipsum parlor, and draw your favorite genitals on our replica of Ypsilanti, Michigan’s iconic Brick Dick water tower.

camps.name: The Graveyard
camps.description: Step into the shadows at our Graveyard Bar! This spine-tingling experience is set in a retro-inspired, spooky bar where legendary creatures lurk and eerie vibes rule the night. With rock music echoing through the crypt, explore the lore of cryptids in the Creature Chronicles and enjoy carnival-style eats worthy of a haunted fairground. Join us for a late night cocktail hour or an intoxicating absinthe tasting, it's the perfect blend of fright and fun. Whether you're a creature feature fan or a cryptid connoisseur, this camp is your backstage pass to the supernatural side of Lucky Lake.

camps.name: The Indubitably Daring Discussion Den
camps.description: Welcome to the Discussion Den! We are a chill space that offers some art fun as well as story telling and discussions in the form of info dumping. Have something you are passionate about and want to talk about to others? Come on in and sign up! We'll have a board for sign ups and you can come in to see what topics are coming up and times each day. We also have miniatures for gifting and painting! We have art tables set up and miniatures from various local creators to gift and you are welcome to sit in the space and paint. Playkea is also returning for its 12th burn as a fun interactable art piece. Build and play with the puzzle tiles as you see fit. I will also have blank tiles available if any artists wish to create a piece design to be cut and added the following year.

camps.name: The Lab
camps.description: The Lab is a place where creativity, experimentation, and connection come to life. It will be an inclusive space where our curiosity brings us closer together. Our offerings will spark joy and enable connection by engaging your senses through light, sound, and/or movement. We'll supply awesome beats, sweet treats, and unique drinks to help bring out your inner scientist. Come play, create, and connect!

camps.name: The Love Network
camps.description: The Love Network is a group of neurodivergent queerdos, offering a variety of queer joy and experiences! We are a micro camp of Y'allville! Check out the interactive Rainbow Pipe Dream water installation! How many water wheels can you spin? Get some pictures in front of our beautiful floral pride flag! Enjoy some impromptu lego building or one of our crafty workshops! Find us on our trans/fat/disabled centered nude beach and grab a mocktail along the way!

camps.name: The Panda Emporium
camps.description: Our name has changed but our mission remains the same. The Panda Emporium, invoking the spirit of Panda, returns this year providing those necessary, hard-to-find, and late-night items. We have cigs, lighters, TP, antacids, tampons, floss, water, gum, sanitizer, wipes, and much, much, more!

camps.name: The Robot and The Mermaid
camps.description: Come to The Robot and The Mermaid to peruse the Cosmic Bureau of Lost Things, a shop full of oddments and curiosities. “Take a Lost Item Home or Bring a Once Loved Item to Wander.” We also offer Tarot to Go: pre-selected tarot readings, 3 cards each, slipped into colorful art-embossed envelopes for your prognostications. Step through our Doorway in Time where colorful images of decades past will surround you and are available for you to peruse and lose yourself in images of lives gone by.

camps.name: The Shitshow
camps.description: We will be hosting a Bleach Clothing Workshop where participants will be able to alter existing clothes or grab an item we are providing to alter with bleach pens and stencils with spray bleach water and will provide a clothesline to dry on. We will periodically have the Sea Hag Hangover Bar and Recovery Area open for gifting hangover remedies. THere will also be periodic food oferings at the bar. We will also be providing Blacklight Body Art in the evenings around dusk. We are hosting a Narwhal Beach Meet up where everyone will receive a Narwhal Horn and we will parade to the barge together! We will be providing a comfy relaxing lounge area that is our recovery room open for all throughout the burn.

camps.name: The Spinsters
camps.description: Welcome to The Spinsters! At the heart of our vibrant theme camp creativity and learning come alive thru a variety of sewing classes and prop manipulation workshops. Our workshops and casual gatherings teach essential techniques and foster learning new things. Campers of all experience levels are invited to explore the art of stitching and personalizing their festival gear. Along side our sewing classes, learn the art of prop manipulation and Join our Buugeng Gang! Daily classes and spontaneous jams sessions encourage self exploration and play.

camps.name: The Swing
camps.description: The Swing is an interactive garden and picnic space, that will host a rococo high tea on Thursday and Saturday at 2 pm. Wear your most elegant finery and imbibe on sweet treats while you take for granted how impossibly fabulous you are. When not hosting tea, this will be a lounge space, where you can indulge in the art of leisure. Remember to stop and smell the flowers.

camps.name: The TeleTwerkers Co-Working Space
camps.description: "Working from home?" We get it. Trying to balance day jobs and other responsibilities WHILE at a burn is the actual worst. So, "work" from "home". All those air quotes mean business! And you too could mean business! Come by, hop on our wifi, maximize your productivity, synergize your deliverables, enjoy our office decor, and have some custom lattes from Starboofs while you get some work done with the Teletwerkers! Business attire required and provided! We'll be open during business hours only. 9-5, Wednesday through Friday. We'll also do "after work drinks" on Friday. Starboofs may be open on Saturday and Sunday mornings, depending on how hungover we are or if we wanna get up and make lattes for all dem thirsty burners.

camps.name: TickTown
camps.description: TickTown is still ticking and we’re tickled to trip through Doorways in Time with you. Join us for incredible DJ’s plus new games (including several retro games from waaaay back when some of us older Ticks were wee kids!) plus all your old favorites. Spin the Wheel for a terrific Tick approved Cocktail at the Snickerin Tick Tavern. Sometimes you just need to be in a place filled with awesome people and good vibes - that's TickTown!! You'll be thrilled you stopped by, and so will we! TickTown loves you!

camps.name: TreeBassin'
camps.description: You wouldn't BeeLieve it! TreeBassin' is stepping back in time with a Disco Doorway to No Where! Access the lake and enjoy the beach, launch your craft, relax on some inflatables, or just stop by for cold slushy! Enjoy our after dark projection arcade and doorway themed 3d art! Daily we curate the beach with inflatable floats for public use, providing a safe environment for Lakes Lovelies to enter and enjoy the water. We also have shared food events on the beach area (ice cream floats with Kraken Creamery) (DCBBQ MeatUP) (Bees Camp Not Sure Picnic) etc Slushy Machine is set up and ready for cold refreshments for wary time travelers.

camps.name: Unregulated Camp
camps.description: Unregulated Camp is a homebrew dive bar, serving a wide range of tasty, handcrafted libations from our draft system. Our offerings include cold, homebrewed beer, draft cocktails, and seltzer water. Don’t miss out on our selection of handcrafted syrups. Seating and boardgames available. Stop by to learn how to make your own homebrew—we'll be brewing on-site. After dark, we strongly encourage participants to push our buttons... if the bus is on fire, we’re open!

camps.name: VALHALLA!
camps.description: Valhalla! A warriors' haven where mortals are treated as the Gods they truly are. Valhalla is a place for the wanderers of the lake to rest their weary feet while raising a horn of mead and sharing tales around the fire. A place for warriors to dock their longships, call upon the ancestors, and hone their skills with games of strength, dexterity, and wit. A place for all to wonder at the beauty of art, partake in Loki's mischief, and prepare themselves for Ragnarok, the last battle.

camps.name: Videogasm
camps.description: ideogasm featuring the Playa Theater. Every night from dusk till at least 2 am we will be showing a variety of shorts, parodies, music videos, experimental films, cult films, interactive live video art, Burning Man related videos and more on our 20’ wide lakefront screen. In the afternoon, come chill to the music in our Sleepy Pickle Lounge, sing karaoke, have a pickleback or cocktail, grab a squeaky pig from our “Piggie Pool”, or a trinket from our gifting tree. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show, Friday at Midnight.

camps.name: Welcome HAUM
camps.description: We offer cozy space for collaboration and authentic connection. Our open mic stage will host poetry readings, music jams, sing-alongs and whatever else people want to be seen and heard in. If you're lucky snacks or fresh warm cookies may happen.

camps.name: Y'allville
camps.description: Visit Y’allville, home of your favorite queerdos and trans folx in an intersectionally inclusive, disability-friendly space that is welcome to all. Participate in inclusive nude-optional beach events, receive silly food gifts at The Glory Bowl, join our queer hoe down, draw your favorite genitals on our replica of Ypsilanti’s iconic Brick Dick, get a fun temporary tattoo at our Lorem Ipsum pop-up parlor, build colorful LEGO creations and other crafts, attend a meditation session, eat some beanies n’ weenies, and grieve dead loved ones in our interactive art piece, Letters to Alyson.

radios.radio_description: Kicking off RadioSGC with Radio Chaos, where no sounds are out of bounds! All styles and genre of music will be represented in order to welcome campers to the lake.
The Doctor is in with music for your mind.

radios.radio_dj_name: Sounds from our Utopian Future with DJ Snax
radios.radio_description: Transporting you to an inspired vision of society's future with psychedelic jazz, ambient and techno tunez.
Funky Grooves from the Jazzy Past to soothe your over-EDMed nervous system.

Music, conversation, and interviews with passing time travelers of the multiverse. How are you navigating existence? We're vibin to some psychadelic tunes while exploring the vastness of the human experience.
The world's happient person welcomes you to the lake and inspires you.
Will your earballs be pleased? Yes.  Will your dance tummy be full. Yes.  Who is your host? Yes!

radios.radio_dj_name: Through the Ages of House with Tabu
radios.radio_description: It will be all house songs that have influenced me over the years.
Part 1 of this set will open your mind with a chill drum and bass session.
Part 2 of this segment with Spectre melts your brain, in a good way.

radios.radio_dj_name: Classical Psychedelia with DJ Won't Die
radios.radio_description: Think classical music is boring? Think again. Tune in for a journey into the psychedelic dimensions of carefully chosen classical selections before coming out the other side.

radios.radio_dj_name: DARKWAVE AFTER DARK w/ Captain Zesty
radios.radio_description: This sonic journey dives deep into the shadowy realms of darkwave, goth rock, and post-punk, showcasing the freshest releases from both rising and established artists.
Get ready for some classic, maybe earwormy, morning music to greet the day!

radios.radio_dj_name: The Rise of the SoulQuarians w/ DJ DarkTwain
radios.radio_description: A chill hour vibe show playing SoulQuarian Hip-Hop artists and interviewing passersby on Soul Hip Hop music and it can be played censored.

radios.radio_dj_name: It's About Time. with Very Kateri
radios.radio_description: Tunes on time from many times.
Time travel to the back seat of Mom's car in the mid 1970's as she tunes in to the easy listening radio station.

Burning is a magic temporal space where all kinds of chaos, chicanery, and chance can occur. A few guests tell their finest burn stories. Hard hitting questions like: Why do you burn? What IYKYK story could have only happened at a burn - whether or not people believe you? Did you meet Daft Punk at the trash fence? What do these experiences mean in our default lives? Tune in to find out - or discover your next side quest.
Enjoy popular songs from each decade of the past 100 years
If you like a little mosh-pit action, come rock your face off with us as we salute the bands who have made RiotFest suck for over two decades.
It's a Gen X vs. Millennial musical face off, surpring each other with secret playlists based on a series of categories agreed upon in advance. Whose selections will cheer the most earballs??

Travel back in time to the magical summer of 2024’s cicada double emergence!  Cicada themed music will delight your ears, and for those who stop by the radio station, you may be rewarded with a gift from the cicada fairy.

radios.radio_dj_name: BenmeR & Whirlwind's "Under the Covers" Game Show
radios.radio_description: This power duo returns to bring their default world radio game show to your earballs in a live performance/competition that will make your doors rattle!
A fun dance party after a riveting game show competition!

radios.radio_dj_name: Dragon Daddy's Delightfully Delirious Dancey Dance
radios.radio_description: I select more than 150 songs each year to choose from during my Radio SGC set, which is mostly on the fly based on watching all the lovely hippies dancing by. The goal is make your booty wiggle & put a smile on your face.

radios.radio_dj_name: DARKWAVE AFTER DARK w/ Captain Zesty
radios.radio_description: Captain Zesty weaves haunting melodies, pulsating rhythms, and introspective lyrics into an provocative experience for night owls and nocturnal music aficionados.
Random stream of consciousness commentary as I play whatever I feel like. No Playlist. DJ Anarchy. Come join my panel of judges as we play the iconic game show "Up all night or Freshly risen?"
Tune in or stop by to see what the mystery surprise is!
While other Hit Music purveyors try to bring you down, we play only the best Hitz with upbeat music and positive lyrics, encouraging and positive messages.
Time travel to the back seat of Mom's car in the mid 1970's as she tunes in to the easy listening radio station.
Brazilian Vibes hosted by yours truly. Bring on the audience interaction cuz he wants to chat with you!
Music collection falling out of a broken mind.
It's 70s roller disco.  If you can't enjoy this vibe on a lazy summer afternoon with 2300 of your closest friends,  you're probably dead.

radios.radio_dj_name: Put On Your Fez and Smoking Jacket
radios.radio_description: Slip into something comfortable and get down to the space age bachelor sound! Jazz vocals, samba, Italian film soundtracks and more! Buttery lounge to soothe and relax.
Time time time, what has become of me?
Another surprise adventure awaits beyond the threshhold.

radios.radio_dj_name: Let There Be House with Archangel
radios.radio_description: A trip through time.
An hour dj set of original music, mostly bass and dubstep
Join me on a drive from nowhere to nowhere. Let’s go to the in-between places, the places where there is only the road, your thoughts, and my thoughts. Which are also your thoughts, of course.

I picked my favorite house, drum and bass, and a mixture of other genres to form one ultimate playlist. Whether you are partying, relaxing, or do whatever The Reverie Hour is here to take your mind and body on a little journey.

radios.radio_dj_name: DARKWAVE AFTER DARK w/ Captain Zesty
radios.radio_description: Expect melancholic tracks, artist spotlights, and moody mystique, perfect for those who thrive in the after-hours gloom.
Join Jam for an early morning playlist that features examples of popular firsts of different musical genres
Pixy provides a power hour of Broadway’s most bizarre, subversive, and delightful tunes, plus a classic or two just for balance.
A collection of earworms and theme songs from children's shows throughout time.
Play some tunes and share some shamanic breathing techniques to help us on our Earth Journey to Calm the Nervous System and Help us Regulate from the fight or flight response.
Chill Dj Set… All hitters, no shitters!
Hot summer favorites for and afternoon in the sun.

DJ Rebar & Brock Lobster the Bong Boy presenta beach punk orgy for your ears inspired by the great John Waters. Stop by our pop up Redneck Riviera to shake that sand out of yer junk, visit our Be Divine Shrine and get some Ask First zines & goodies.

Delving into the science of doors, thresholds, and the spaces in between. From hinges & security systems to liminal spaces & boundary-breaking discoveries, we’ll crack open surprising facts that might just change how you see the everyday. To give your brain a breather, we’re mixing in science-themed songs between each segment—because no mind should be blown without a beat.
I'd plan to play some Funky, chill, yet fun and upbeat breakbeats and classics to lift spirits and psych people up for the big burn and use my "Radio Voice" to get some feel good vibes going.

Before the burn, comes the Twist-Up.  A constantly evolving playlist of (what I believe to be) exceptional entries from my music library. Crank your radio as everybody in camp gets ready to walk down to the peninsula.
The RadioSGC crew will be highlighting all of your fancy outfits as you walk by the radio station!
BenmeR transmits a live broadcast of all the sounds from this year's Conclave performance, fireworks and Effigy Burn! Tune in from anywhere around the lake and be a part of the experience.
Turn on your afterburners, lets celebrate!

radios.radio_dj_name: Faery Mama from the black hole
radios.radio_description: We cant find her at the lake, but her SOS transmission is coming through.
Chill sounds to close the night out right. (FM & Livestream Only)
Chill sounds that to calm your energy and allow you to reflect.
Good Morning, I hope that you had a good burn. Here are 3 hours of music from the RadioSGC crew to help you get your sh!t together and leave the magical garden.

vehicles.title: Shroom shroom
vehicles.description: Shroom shroom loves you all so mush! You'll find this fungi slowly making its way around the lake offering gifts and using mycoremediation to clean up that MOOP

locations.name: Check with Drink, Bitch! for location. Look for the flag. Probably in a quiet place near camp.
Cookies will be handed out randomly around the lake
Could be anywhere, aka where the party is…
Disco Bees, in Village Not Sure
North of the showers, in the shade
North of the showers, in the shade, going into the quiet area from the effigy
Open camping - look for Scovill’age sign
Roving cart housed at Drink, Bitch!
Walking around the lake with the Rice Krispie cart.
Walking around the lake with the Rice Krispy cart.
